000338.SZ.summary: Weichai Power Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells diesel engines, automobiles, and other major automobile components in China and internationally. It operates through Engines, Automobiles and Automobile Components, and Intelligent Logistics segments. The company provides design, development, production, sale, repair, and import and export of engines and auxiliary products, automobile axles, gear boxes and components, and other automobile components; hydraulic pumps and motors; hydraulic valves; gears and gear transmission devices; ancillary casting and casting products of hydraulic components; internal combustion engines, energy powertrain systems and ancillary products; technical consultation and technical services; leasing of self-owned houses; steel; business management services; and forklift trucks, and warehousing technology and supply chain solution services. It offers its products under various brands, including Weichai Power Engine, Fast Gear, Hande Axle, Shacman Heavy Truck, and Linder Hydraulics. Weichai Power Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Weifang, the People's Republic of China.

000404.SZ.summary: Changhong Huayi Compressor Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and sells various compressors in China and internationally. Its products are used in refrigerators, freezers, water dispensers, ice machines, and dehumidifiers. The company was formerly known as Huayi Compressor Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Changhong Huayi Compressor Co., Ltd. in July 2018. Changhong Huayi Compressor Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jingdezhen, China.

000410.SZ.summary: Shenyang Machine Tool Co., Ltd. provides cutting, milling, boring, and drilling solutions. The company offers horizontal and vertical lathes, and turning and milling centers; and special machinery, such as pipe thread, axle, differential case, hub, pipe coupling, sucker rod, and wheelset machines, as well as flexible machining units using turning in place of grinding. It also provides gantry type machining, horizontal milling and boring machining, vertical machining, and high speed machining centers; CNC milling and boring lathes/machining centers; and CNC drilling machines. It serves automobile, wind energy, aviation, coal mine machinery, shipbuilding, electronics, rail transport, and engineering machinery industries. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenyang, China.

000530.SZ.long_name: Bingshan Refrigeration & Heat Transfer Technologies Co., Ltd.
000530.SZ.summary: Bingshan Refrigeration & Heat Transfer Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, sale, installation, and maintenance of industrial and commercial refrigeration and air-conditioning equipment in China. It also engages in refrigerated and frozen food storage business; and the provision of after-sales, maintenance, warranty, and other services. The company was formerly known as Dalian Refrigeration Company Limited and changed its name to Bingshan Refrigeration & Heat Transfer Technologies Co., Ltd. in December 2019. The company was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in Dalian, China.

000570.SZ.summary: Changchai Company, Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells small and medium-sized single cylinder and multi-cylinder diesel engines under the Changchai brand in the People's Republic of China. Its diesel engines are used in tractors, combine harvesters, light commercial vehicles, agriculture equipment, small-sized construction machinery, generating sets, ship machines, etc. The company also provides diesel engine fittings and castings, gasoline engines, gasoline engine fittings, rotovators, walking tractors, molds, and jigs. In addition, it engages in the assembly and sale of diesel engine and gasoline engine supporting sets. Further, the company provides external investment and consulting services; and Real estate management services. The company exports its products. Changchai Company, Limited was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Changzhou, the People's Republic of China.

000584.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Hagong Intelligent Robot Co., Ltd. engages in the intelligent manufacturing business in the People's Republic of China. The company offers intelligent logistics systems, such as logistics sorting, robotic warehousing, automated high-rise warehouse, and warehouse management systems; automobile automatic production lines; robotic application platform; and artificial intelligence solutions for building of data centers, research in sensing technology, machine vision, synergistic robots, and intelligent security protection. It also develops real estate projects; sells, repairs, and maintains technological application of robots and peripheral equipment; and designs, manufactures, installs, and debugs assembly line for autocar-body-in-white (BIW) welding. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Youli Investment Holding Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Hagong Intelligent Robot Co., Ltd. in August 2017. Jiangsu Hagong Intelligent Robot Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

000595.SZ.summary: Baota Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells bearings primarily in China. The company offers deep groove ball, cylindrical roller, spherical and needle roller, angular contact ball, tapered roller, thrust ball and roller, and spherical plain bearings. Its products are used in various industries, including rail transit, military, precision motors, petroleum machinery, metallurgy machinery, heavy truck, construction machinery, mining machinery, cement machinery, hydraulic engineering, etc. The company also exports its products to approximately 50 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Xibei Bearing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Baota Industry Co., Ltd. in June 2015. Baota Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is based in Yinchuan, China.

000666.SZ.summary: Jingwei Textile Machinery Company Limited produces and sells textile machinery and related parts in China. The company offers cotton spinning, weaving, warp knitting, twisting, printing and dyeing, and chemical fiber machinery. It also engages in the financial trust and equity investment businesses. Jingwei Textile Machinery Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is based in Beijing, China.

000777.SZ.long_name: CNNC SUFA Technology Industry Co., Ltd.
000777.SZ.summary: CNNC SUFA Technology Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of industrial valves in China and internationally. The company offers utility, ball, check, shut-off, gate, and nuclear valves. It provides its products under the H and SUFA brands for petroleum and gas, oil refining, nuclear power, electric power, metallurgy, chemical, shipbuilding, papermaking, and medicine industries. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Suzhou, China.

000837.SZ.long_name: Qinchuan Machine Tool & Tool Group Share Co., Ltd.
000837.SZ.summary: Qinchuan Machine Tool & Tool Group Share Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells precision CNC machine tools and cutting tools in China. The company offers CNC machine tools, such as lathes, grinding machines, machining centers, specialty machines, and plastics machinery; and components and precision parts comprising gear parts and gearboxes, hydraulics parts and systems, iron castings, and meters and gauges. It also provides tooling and fixtures, including gear cutting tools, broaching cutters, special cutting tools, special milling cutters, measuring gauges, and thread cutters; and measuring equipment, which include gear measuring machines, and camshaft and crankshaft measuring machines. The company was founded in 1965 and is based in Baoji, China.

000922.SZ.long_name: Harbin Electric Corporation Jiamusi Electric Machine CO.,Ltd
000922.SZ.summary: Harbin Electric Corporation Jiamusi Electric Machine CO.,Ltd manufactures and sells electric motors in the People's Republic of China. The company offers wind turbines, shielding products, and nuclear power products, as well as equipment. It also exports its products to 48 countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Acheng Relay Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Harbin Electric Corporation Jiamusi Electric Machine CO.,Ltd in September 2012. The company is based in Jiamusi, the People's Republic of China.

000967.SZ.long_name: Infore Environment Technology Group Co., Ltd.
000967.SZ.summary: Infore Environment Technology Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells sanitation machines and environmental protection equipment in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company provides various sanitation equipment, such as sweeping vehicles, cleaning vehicles, garbage trucks, municipal vehicles, snow removal vehicles, intelligent equipment, refuse transfer stations, and new energy equipment; and environmental fans, including nuclear power fans, industrial environmental fans, civil engineering fans, and subway fans. It also offers environmental monitoring products comprising water quality, atmospheric, and hydrological monitoring products. In addition, the company provides environmental services, including sanitation integration services, such as township road sweeping, waste collection and transportation, and sanitation information management services; solid waste management; smart environmental management; atmospheric governance; soil remediation; and water environment treatment services. Further, it designs and develops smart environmental protection systems. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Shangfeng Industrial Holdings Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Infore Environment Technology Group Co., Ltd. in January 2016. Infore Environment Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Beijiao, the People's Republic of China.

002006.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Jinggong Science & Technology Co., Ltd
002006.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Jinggong Science & Technology Co., Ltd manufactures and sells solar photovoltaic equipment, carbon fiber composite materials and equipment, new building energy-saving equipment, textile equipment, and robot intelligence equipment. The company provides photovoltaic equipment, including polysilicon ingot furnaces and squarer's, and multi-wire slicing machines. It also offers building machinery comprising PU/mineral wool/PIR sandwich panel lines, double-deck high speed roll forming machines, fence board production lines, digital control folders, sandwich composite production lines, floor deck forming machines, high speed tile forming machines, roll forming machines, down pipe forming and curving pipe machines, purlin forming machines, and changeable automatic purlin forming machines. In addition, the company provides corrugated Web H-beam automatic welding lines, steel bar truss production lines, beam welding lines, box-shape column/beam welding lines, digital control drillers, section material benders, and shot blasting machines; and press curving machines, automatic seamers, slitting machines, filming covering and cutting machines, edge knurling machines, stacker cranes, and uncoilers. Further, it offers textile equipment, such as nylon machines, fancy and fiber twisters, rotor spinning machines, loose/tight winders, axial winders, spandex covered yarn machines, and metallic yarn covering machines; silver and air coated wires; and rubber coated wire lines. Additionally, the company provides precision processing and manufacturing machines for raw material preparation, material baiting, welding, machining, inspection, preassembly, and packaging and transport; and other high-tech products. Zhejiang Jinggong Science & Technology Co., Ltd is based in Shaoxing, China.

002008.SZ.long_name: Han's Laser Technology Industry Group Co., Ltd.
002008.SZ.summary: Han's Laser Technology Industry Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of laser processing equipment in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers laser engraving/marking/etching, laser welding, laser cutting, sub-surface engraving, laser display, 3D printers, automation, inspection, CNC, and industrial robot machines. Its products are primarily used in the electronics and semiconductor, mechanical hardware, PCB industry, new energy, packaging industry, sheet metal, auto industry, and other applications. The company also provides machine installation and after sales services. The company was formerly known as Han's Laser Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Han's Laser Technology Industry Group Co., Ltd. in November 2014. Han's Laser Technology Industry Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

002009.SZ.summary: Miracle Automation Engineering Co.,Ltd provides intelligent equipment solutions and services in China and internationally. The company is involved in the research and development of equipment logistics equipment. It also offers waste automobile recycling and dismantling, crushing and sorting resource utilization, and automobile dismantling equipment, as well as trades automobile recycling parts through e-commerce; manufacturing equipment for automotive, new energy, and machinery industries; and intelligent equipment logistics and system equipment for automobile manufacturing, airport logistics, commercial distribution, and others. In addition, the company provides large-scale wind turbine components, diesel engine parts, and gas turbine parts; and professional logistics solutions and turnkey project services. Further, it is involved in the design, construction, system integration, procurement, and consulting of photovoltaic power stations. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Miracle Logistics System Engineering Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Miracle Automation Engineering Co., Ltd. in April 2013. Miracle Automation Engineering Co.,Ltd was founded in 1984 and is based in Wuxi, China.

002021.SZ.summary: Zoje Resources Investment Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells industrial sewing machines primarily in China. It offers lockstitch, overlock, interlock, pattern, heavy, and special series machines. The company was formerly known as Zoje Sewing Machine Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zoje Resources Investment Co., Ltd. in November 2014. Zoje Resources Investment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Taizhou, China.

002026.SZ.summary: Shandong Weida Machinery Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells drill chucks primarily in China. The company offers various types of drill chuks, including performance drill chucks, hand drill chucks, locking drill chucks, wrench drill chucks, self-tightening chucks, and trimming wheels and accessories; and saw blades. It also provides precision castings for power tools accessories, machining products, auto parts, hardware and tools, instrumentation valves, other foundry products, and die-casting products. In addition, the company offers powder metallurgy parts comprising structure parts, garden tools, electrical tools, bench drills, and oil bearing parts, as well as parts for use in small gasoline engine, appliances, and automotive applications. Further, it provides AC and DC switches; portable power supply products; and CNC machines. The company offers its products under the Peacock, Jiyi Machine, and DEMAC brands. Shandong Weida Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is based in Wendeng, China.

002046.SZ.summary: Sinomach Precision Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells special bearings and relevant parts in China. The company offers petroleum machinery, precision, slewing, wind turbine, special precision, automotive, hydrodynamic, one-way, spherical roller, standard ball, and taper roller bearing products, as well as bearings for rolling mills and rail transportation. It also provides spindles; precision bearing instruments that include bearing parts measuring instruments, finished bearing measuring instruments, air-floating and dense-ball spindles, induction heaters, and degaussing equipment; bearing testing machines; and bearing manufacturing machines. In addition, the company offers bearing relevant materials, such as ZYS bearing steel products, ceramic balls and carbide balls, steel ball products, cemented carbide cutting tool tips, bearing antirust lubricating oil and grease products, and bearing cage materials. Further, it provides abrasion-resistant materials that comprise overall abrasion-resistant alloy replacement parts and duplex metal composite guide products. The company's products are used in various industries, such as aviation, spaceflight, vessel, weapon, mining, metallurgy, wind turbine generator, machine tool, machinery, medical treatment, automobile, rail transport, etc. The company was formerly known as Luoyang Bearing Science & Technology Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Sinomach Precision Industry Co., Ltd. in December 2020. Sinomach Precision Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Luoyang, China.

002050.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Sanhua Intelligent Controls Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, manufacture, sale, and service of HVAC&R controls and components in China and internationally. The company offers refrigeration control components, automotive air conditioning, thermal management system components, coffee machine, dishwasher parts, etc. Its product includes valve, four-way reversing valve, electronic expansion valve, solenoid valve, controller, micro channel heat exchanger, home appliance heat pump control system part, pump, heating pipe, and water softening system and divider, as well as electronic water and oil pump, electronic water valve, water cooling plate, thermostatic valve, thermal expansion valve, liquid receiver, automatic air conditioner controller, etc. The company's products are used in household and commercial air conditioners, food chain retailers, and heat management and pump systems. Zhejiang Sanhua Intelligent Controls Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shaoxing, China.

002073.SZ.summary: Mesnac Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and innovates information equipment and software application for rubber industry in China and internationally. The company offers mixing solutions; mixer feeding systems; chemical weighing system; rubber grinding and blending system; volumetric metering system; open mill automatic mixing system; open mill; integrated exhaust gas control solution; inner-liner production line; pin type cold feed extruder; small angle, textile cord ply, and ply cutting line; application production line; and tire profile extrusion line. It also provides tire building machine; hydraulic cutting presses for TBR, OTR, and PCR; and PCR, TBR, and OTR molds, as well as produces tire recycling products. In addition, the company offers tire X-ray inspection machines; tire uniformity and dynamic balance testing line; tire uniformity testing machine; testing solutions; tire plant automated logistics system solutions; X-ray automated assistant inspection software; RFID tire whole solution; RFID based process management and control system of tire production; JIT production MES systems; warehouse management systems; energy management system; industrial equipment configuration software platform; industry big data service mobile application; and tire retreading. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Qingdao, China.

002122.SZ.summary: Tianma Bearing Group Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells bearings in China. The company offers deep groove and angular contact ball bearings; cylindrical, double-row spherical, thrust spherical, and tapered roller bearings; rolling mill and petroleum machinery bearings; and railway, aircraft, wind power slewing, and nonstandard bearings. Its products are used in the aerospace, military, railway, commercial vehicle, industry, marine, machine tool, metallurgical mill, motor, agriculture, etc. The company's products are also exported in Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Huzhou, China.

002147.SZ.summary: Neoglory prosperity Inc. operates as a commercial real estate company. The company also manufactures and sells precision machineries. In addition, it is involved in the tourism industry. The company is based in Ma'anshan, China. Neoglory prosperity Inc. is a subsidiary of Neoglory Holdings Group Co. Ltd.

002158.SZ.long_name: Shanghai Hanbell Precise Machinery Co., Ltd.
002158.SZ.summary: Shanghai Hanbell Precise Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and after-sales service of screw compressors in China. Its products include screw refrigerating, refrigerant, and air compressors, as well as vacuum pumps. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Hanbell Machinery Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Hanbell Precise Machinery Co., Ltd. in December 2005. Shanghai Hanbell Precise Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Shanghai, China.

002164.SZ.summary: Ningbo Donly Co.,Ltd researches and develops, produces, and services transmission equipment in China. The company offers gearboxes, motors, couplings, and transmission products primarily used in metallurgy, mining, water conservancy, electric power, petrochemical, building materials, ports, light industry, environmental protection, and other industries. It also engages in development, production, and sale of automatic control devices and automatic induction doors, for medical door, commercial door, and industrial door systems, as well as offers engineering services. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Donly Transmission Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ningbo Donly Co.,Ltd in January 2014. Ningbo Donly Co.,Ltd was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

002202.SZ.long_name: Xinjiang Goldwind Science & Technology Co., Ltd.
002202.SZ.summary: Xinjiang Goldwind Science & Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides wind power solutions in China and internationally. It operates through four segments: WTG Manufacturing, Wind Power Services, Wind Farm Development, and Other Business. The company engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of wind turbine generators and wind power components; development, construction, maintenance, operation, and sale of wind farms; and provision of wind power related consultancy and maintenance services. It is also involved in the manufacture and sale of wind power equipment and accessories; development and operation of water treatment plants; provision of finance leasing services; and development and operation of solar power generation projects. Xinjiang Goldwind Science & Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Urumqi, China.

002204.SZ.long_name: Dalian Huarui Heavy Industry Group Co., LTD.
002204.SZ.summary: Dalian Huarui Heavy Industry Group Co., Ltd. manufactures, sells, and services technical equipment primarily in China. The company offers bulk material handling, port, coke oven, metallurgic, and lifting machineries; bridge and gantry cranes; cranes for metallurgical plants; laminar spray welded rollers and galvanized sink rollers, as well as furnace rollers for cold rolling mills; wind turbines components; high-end castings; and ship crankshafts. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1914 and is headquartered in Dalian, China.

002224.SZ.summary: Sanlux Co., Ltd manufactures and sells various rubber V-belts. It offers classical wrapped, wedge wrapped, classical and wedge raw edge cogged, conveyor, banded classical and wedge, double, and agricultural V-belts, as well as air and water hoses. The company also provides automobile belts, such as raw edge cogged and laminated belts, raw edge plain belts, and timing and poly V-belts. It serves customers in approximately 70 countries and regions, including Europe, the United States, Asia, and Africa. Sanlux Co., Ltd was founded in 1984 and is based in Shaoxing, China.

002248.SZ.summary: Weihai Huadong Automation Co., Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells CNC systems, CNC machine tools, and related parts in China. Its products include cylindrical grinding machines; surface grinders; vertical and horizontal milling machines; gantry grinding and milling machines; milling machines; and functional accessories. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Weihai, China.

002255.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Hailu Heavy Industry Co., Ltd.
002255.SZ.summary: Suzhou Hailu Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells energy saving and environmental protection equipment. The company undertakes environmental engineering projects; and offers boilers for use in various industries, such as power generation, steel making, non-ferrous, coking, petrol-chemical, chemical, and paper making. It also provides nuclear power equipment, such as basket shell, bubblers, accumulators, high temperature gas cooled reactors, hangers, etc.; heavy pressure vessels and vessels of special materials; and marine and on-land cryogenic products. The company also exports its products to the United States, Europe, Japan, Africa, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and internationally. Suzhou Hailu Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

002266.SZ.summary: Zhefu Holding Group Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the research and development, manufacture, installation, and service of hydropower equipment in China and internationally. It offers conventional hydro turbine-generator units; pump-storage units; and tidal power generation units, as well as mechanical and electrical works for EPC projects. The company also provides nuclear power equipment; and motors and generators. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Fuchunjiang Hydropower Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhefu Holding Group Co., Ltd. in January 2014. Zhefu Holding Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Tonglu, China. Zhefu Holding Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Tonglu, China.

002270.SZ.summary: Huaming Power Equipment Co.,Ltd provides voltage regulation solutions in China. The company offers conventional, vacuum, dry, and gas insulated on-load tap changers; and cage and drum de-energized (off-circuit) tap changers for transformers. It also provides accessories, such as motor drive units, online oil filters, controllers, and other accessories. The company's products as used in chemical, metallurgical, and railway projects, as well as power grids, and energy and other sectors. In addition, it provides training and after-sales services. The company also exports its products to approximately 80 countries in the United States, Asia, Europe, Africa, and Oceania. The company was formerly known as Shandong FIN CNC Machine Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Huaming Power Equipment Co.,Ltd in July 2016. Huaming Power Equipment Co.,Ltd was founded in 1989 is based in Shanghai, China.

002272.SZ.summary: Sichuan Crun Co., Ltd provides energy conservation and environmental protection equipment manufacturing and engineering services in the People's Republic of China. The company develops, manufactures, and sells lubrication, cooling, and hydraulic equipment; and system solutions and services primarily in various industries, such as wind power, solar power, petroleum and natural gas, etc. It also develops and manufactures waste heat recovery boilers, biomass boilers, wound tube heat exchangers, power station auxiliaries, boiler parts, etc. In addition, the company provides EPC project services for small power plants; and energy conservation and emission reduction engineering services for power plants primarily in the industry of building materials, metallurgy, thermal power, etc. Sichuan Crun Co., Ltd was founded in 1992 and is based in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

002342.SZ.summary: Juli Sling Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells rigging products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers textile slings, mooring ropes, chain slings, wire ropes, steel wire rope slings, clamp lifting beam pulleys, lifting clamps, cables, and steel tie rods; and engages in the crane and steel works. It serves the nuclear power, wind energy, hydro power, ship building, metallurgy, bridge construction, mining, aerospace, ocean engineering, machinery, transportation, port construction, spatial structure, machinery manufacturing, and other lifting industries. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Baoding, the People's Republic of China.

002347.SZ.summary: Taier Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, markets, and services metallurgical equipment in China. The company offers industrial universal shafts, gear couplings, shear blades, sliding plates, mandrels, compactors, automobile-transmission shafts, automobile spare parts, and others. It also provides wire rod coil compactors; bar bundling, H-beam tying, strapping, and spray marking machines; and de-coilers/re-coilers, as well as compactor spare parts. The company was formerly known as Anhui Taier Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Taier Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. in February 2013. Taier Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Ma'anshan, China.

002366.SZ.long_name: Taihai Manoir Nuclear Equipment Co., Ltd.
002366.SZ.summary: Taihai Manoir Nuclear Equipment Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, and production of nuclear power equipment and other equipment materials. It provides equipment and materials, and services for nuclear power, energy, shipping, metallurgy, petrochemical, marine engineering, aviation, high-speed railway, nuclear reprocessing, and other areas. The company was formerly known as Danfu Compressor Co.,LTD. Taihai Manoir Nuclear Equipment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Yantai, China. Taihai Manoir Nuclear Equipment Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Yantai Taihai Group Co., Ltd.

002367.SZ.summary: Canny Elevator Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, installation, and maintenance of elevators. The company offers high speed, machine room less, panorama, hospital, freight, and home-use elevators under the CANNY brand; and heavy-duty and public traffic type escalators, as well as moving walks. It provides its products for residential and commercial, public, and other projects, as well as city complexes and hotels. The company also exports its products to approximately 100 countries and regions. Canny Elevator Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

002430.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Oxygen Plant Group Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells air separation units, petrochemical equipment, and industrial gases worldwide. It offers air separation equipment; air turbine compressors; steam heaters, adsorbers, three-bar valves, and other products; cooling systems; heat exchange and rectification systems; oxygen and nitrogen compressor units; liquid storage systems; and pump valve products. The company's petrochemical equipment include ethylene cold boxes, liquid nitrogen washing devices, liquefied natural gas plants, alkane dehydrogenation olefin plants, cold box separation systems, methanol to olefin devices, and CO/H2 separation devices. It also provides oxygen, nitrogen, argon, carbon dioxide and other conventional gases; and rare gases, such as antimony, bismuth, and other special gases for use in the petroleum, chemical, steel, non-ferrous metals, electronics, food, health, medical, biopharmaceutical, and other industries. In addition, the company offers environmental protection equipment, steel structural engineering, non-ferrous metal castings, cryogenic liquid transportation vehicles, and various types of process compressors. Further, it undertakes air-contracting and general contracting projects. The company was formerly known as HANGZHOU HANGYANG Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hangzhou Oxygen Plant Group Co.,Ltd. in December 2019. Hangzhou Oxygen Plant Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1950 and is based in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

002435.SZ.long_name: Changjiang Runfa Health Industry Co., Ltd.
002435.SZ.summary: Changjiang Runfa Health Industry Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, sells, and services elevator system components in China and internationally. It offers solid guide rails used for vertical lift solid main rail tracks; rough guides for the processing of T-type solids; hollow guide rails for use in vertical sub-tracks; ladder rails for escalator rail and moving walkways; rail blanks; and elevator guide rails. The company also provides elevator parts, such as rail frames, weight boxes, upper and lower beams, columns, hanging round the doors, door rails, buffers, door pockets, door openers, connecting plates, pressure plates, whip guides, etc. In addition, it offers escalator parts, including sprockets, chains, aprons, inside and outside covers, upper and lower stills, truss, rails guides, guide wheels, brackets, bottom-oriented products, school-foot board brackets, and other parts. The company was formerly known as Changjiang Runfa Medicine Co., Ltd.. Changjiang Runfa Health Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

002438.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Shentong Valve Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells special valves in China and internationally. The company primarily offers butterfly valves, ball valves, gate valves, stop valves, check valves, control valves, special valves, etc. Its products are used in the fields of metallurgy, nuclear power, thermal power, chemical processing of coal, petroleum and natural gas gathering and transportation, petroleum refining and chemical, sea water desalination, etc. Jiangsu Shentong Valve Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Qidong, China.

002441.SZ.summary: Zhongyeda Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the distribution of industrial electrical products primarily in China. It also produces and sells system integration products. The company primarily offers low-voltage and medium-voltage transmission and distribution products; and industrial automation products. It provides electric vehicle charging systems, oil drilling electrical control systems, wind power electronic control systems, marine electric propulsion systems, and harmonic control products. The company's electrical industry solutions include design, equipment supply, software programming, platform building, system integration, electrical engineering, and operation and maintenance services. Zhongyeda Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.

002445.SZ.long_name: Zhongnan Red Culture Group Co., Ltd.
002445.SZ.summary: Zhongnan Red Culture Group Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of various steel materials of pipe fittings and flanges primarily in China. The company offers butt-welding, socket welding, and thread fittings, such as elbows, tees, reducers, caps, and stub ends; and skids and pressure vessels. It is also involved in piping prefabrication activity. The company's products are used in petrochemical, petroleum, chemical, ship building, textile, paper plant, power plant, metallurgical, food, machinery, pharmaceutical, construction, gas, nuclear power, offshore industries, etc. It also exports its products to the Middle East, Brazil, Japan, the United States, Korea, Singapore, India, Pakistan, Vietnam, Germany, and other countries and regions. The company was formerly known as Jiangyin Zhongnan Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhongnan Red Culture Group Co., Ltd. in May 2016. Zhongnan Red Culture Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Jiangyin, China.

002452.SZ.summary: Changgao Electric Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of power equipment in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers ring main units, metal-enclosed switchgears, disconnector switches, earthing switches, circuit breakers, and H-GIS and GIS equipment, as well as low/medium voltage switchgears and other products. It also offers engineering services comprising operation and maintenance, construction, equipment supply, design, financial support, and consulting in the areas of transmission and distribution, and renewable energy. The company was formerly known as Hunan Changgao Highvoltage Switchgear Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Changgao Electric Group Co., Ltd. in December 2017. Changgao Electric Group Co., Ltd. is based in Changsha, the People's Republic of China.

002483.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Rainbow Heavy Industries Co., Ltd.
002483.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Rainbow Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. engages in equipment manufacturing, and energy conservation and environmental protection businesses worldwide. It offers a range of material lifting, offshore equipment, marine equipment, car parking equipment, engineering vessels, and other related products. The company offers its cranes under the GENMA brand. It also provides industrial wastewater treatment, sludge treatment, and hazardous solid waste disposal, as well as energy saving and recycling services. Jiangsu Rainbow Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Nantong, China.

002529.SZ.summary: Fujian Haiyuan Composites Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of hydraulic press equipment and related devices in China and internationally. It provides automatic hydraulic ceramic water-permeable plaza tile presses, autoclaved brick and AAC products, composite materials related equipment, ceramic tile related equipment, refractory materials related equipment, and automotive related equipment, as well as eante fiber reinforced thermoplastic composite formwork and automotive related products. The company was formerly known as Fujian Haiyuan Automatic Equipments Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fujian Haiyuan Composites Technology Co.,Ltd. in August 2018. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.

002530.SZ.summary: JC Finance&Tax Interconnect Holdings Ltd. engages in Internet finance and taxation, and heat treatment businesses in China. It offers financial taxation cloud services, smart online taxation bureau, and other related services that helps companies in decision making, and control financial and taxation risk and inner finance resolutions, as well as provides risk scanning, financial warning, and other intelligent business services. The company also manufactures and sells atmosphere furnace, vacuum furnace, induction equipment, non-atmosphere heating equipment, plasma equipment, software, and auxiliary equipment; and accessories. Its products are used in aerospace, automotive, engineering machinery, rail transportation, ships, chemical machinery, machine parts, and other industries. JC Finance & Tax Interconnect Holdings Ltd. also exports its products to United States, Japan, France, Italy, Spain, Russia, Kazakhstan, South Korea, North Korea, Singapore, Malaysia, India, Thailand, Brazil, Turkey, Mexico, Indonesia, Vietnam, Pakistan, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Fengdong Thermal Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to JC Finance&Tax Interconnect Holdings Ltd. in May 2017. JC Finance&Tax Interconnect Holdings Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Yancheng, China.

002534.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Boiler Group Co., Ltd. and its subsidiaries consult, develop, produce, sell, and install boilers, pressure vessels, environment protection equipment, new energy equipment, and other products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. Its products include CCPP HRSG boilers; heat recovery boiler for metallurgic industry; and HRSG for chemical industry and constructional material. The company's products also comprise utility boilers, such as circulating fluidized bed boilers, pulverized coal utility boilers, BFG boilers, and water-coal slurry boilers; special and industrial boilers, which comprise biomass boilers, pure refuse incineration boilers and CFB refuses, hot water boilers, and chain stoker boilers; utility auxiliary products, such as HP heaters, LP feed water heaters, deaerators, and condensers; and flue-gas purifier, coal chemicals, and others. In addition, it is involved in the refuse incineration treatment projects; co-generation, CCPP, and waste heat recovery/MSW/biomass/BFG/coal combustion power generation; research and development, manufacture, marketing, construction, and EPC service of waste heat recovery boilers, power plant boilers, industrial boilers, pressure vessels, etc.; and design and manufacture of boiler auxiliaries, various special equipment, and heavy-duty equipment. Further, it provides industrial automatic technology consulting, design development, supply, commissioning, and technical services for equipment; and professional personnel for machinery manufacturing industry. The company was founded in 1955 and is based in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

002535.SZ.long_name: Linzhou Heavy Machinery Group Co., Ltd
002535.SZ.summary: Linzhou Heavy Machinery Group Co., Ltd manufactures and sells coal mining machinery and equipment in China. The company offers roadheaders, shearers, belt conveyors, scraper conveyors, metal top beams, fluid couplings, rescue cabins, and hydraulic brackets. It also provides iron and steel casting and forging, energy equipment, high-tech equipment, mine construction and operation, and financial leasing services. In addition, the company engages in the explosion-proof electrical appliances; robotic product manufacturing, sales, maintenance, and leasing; iron pig foundry; and commercial factoring businesses. Linzhou Heavy Machinery Group Co., Ltd was founded in 1987 and is based in Linzhou, China.

002559.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Yawei Machine Tool Co., Ltd.
002559.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Yawei Machine Tool Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells metal forming machine tools in China and internationally. Its products include smart and automatic products, such as CNC turret punching machines, CNC press brakes, CNC laser cutting machines, flexible cells and systems, automatic coil lines, and linear and horizontal multi-joint robots. The company also offers sheet metal processing machine-tools; laser processing equipment; and coil line equipment. It serves sheet metal, electric, elevator and escalator, and curtain wall industries. Jiangsu Yawei Machine Tool Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is based in Yangzhou, China.

002564.SZ.summary: SuZhou THVOW Technology. Co. ,Ltd engages in the research and development and application of clean energy and environmental protection technologies in China and internationally. The company offers equipment, such as coal chemical, petrochemical, fine chemical, metallurgy, and nuclear power equipment; marine and military equipment; and renewable and clean energy equipment. It also provides thermal, solar, and biomass power generation services; and EPC engineering consulting services, as well as constructs power projects. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Tianwo Science and Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to SuZhou THVOW Technology. Co. ,Ltd in March 2015. SuZhou THVOW Technology. Co. ,Ltd is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

002576.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Tongda Power Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells stators and rotors, and laminations for motors and generators primarily in China. The company offers stators and rotors for wind power generators; HV and LV, and other special-sized motors; generator products; laminations and cores; and electromotor lamination stator dies, precise compound dies, single punching dies, aluminum rotor die-casting molds, and machine parts and components of precision dies and automatic lines. Jiangsu Tongda Power Technology Co.,Ltd. is based in Tongzhou, China.

002592.SZ.summary: Nanning Baling Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of copper and aluminum tube-fin heat exchanger products in Mainland China. It offers aluminum and copper cooling tubes, zigzag fins, single and double corrugated fins, and out-road fins; and passenger car air heater blowers, passenger car and bus intercoolers, and heavy duty truck intercoolers. The company also provides bus radiators, computer CPU radiators, aluminum and copper passenger car radiators, engineering machine radiators, and aluminum and copper heavy duty truck radiators; and passenger car and bus cooling modules. Its products are used in automobile, engineering machinery, defense equipment, and computer fields. The company also exports its products primarily to the United States and Australia. Nanning Baling Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Nanning, China.

002595.SZ.long_name: Himile Mechanical Science and Technology (Shandong) Co., Ltd
002595.SZ.summary: Himile Mechanical Science and Technology (Shandong) Co., Ltd manufactures and sells tire molds in China and internationally. It also offers gas turbine casings, castings, and rubber machinery. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Gaomi, China. Himile Mechanical Science and Technology (Shandong) Co., Ltd is a subsidiary of Himile Group Co.,Ltd.

002598.SZ.summary: Shandong Zhangqiu Blower Co., Ltd manufactures and sells various blowers. Its principal products include root and turbo blowers, centrifugal blowers and fans, slurry and industrial pumps, liquid ring vacuum pumps, mills, and pneumatic conveying equipment and systems. The company exports its products to approximately 70 countries, including the European Union and North America. It offers blowers to its distributors, OEMs, and end users. Shandong Zhangqiu Blower Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Shandong Zhangqiu Blower Factory Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Jinan, China.

002613.SZ.summary: Luoyang Northglass Technology Co.,Ltd designs, develops, and manufactures glass deep processing equipment in China. The company's deep processing equipment comprise glass tempering furnaces, low-e coating machines, glass automation systems, glass cutting machines, glass storage systems, buffer systems, vertical glass seaming machines, and vertical washing machines. It also offers deep processed glass products, such as toughened, laminated, curved, insulating, printed, and coated glass products; and HVLS and general fans. The company also exports its products to approximately 80 countries, such as the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, France, Japan, Russia, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, etc. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Luoyang, China.

002621.SZ.long_name: Dalian My Gym Education Technology Co., Ltd.
002621.SZ.summary: Dalian My Gym Education Technology Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells corrugated pipe production equipment in Southeast Asia, the Middle East, Africa, Europe, and the United States. The company offers plastic machinery products, such as HDPE/PP double wall and high-speed corrugated, solid, PE, PVC, and HDPE corrugated pipe extrusion lines, as well as belling machines, perforators, and extruder series machinery. It also provides general machinery products. The company was formerly known as Dalian Sunlight Machinery Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Dalian My Gym Education Technology Co., Ltd. In April 2019. The company is based in Dalian, China.

002622.SZ.summary: Rongyu Group Co., Ltd. engages in electrical equipment, credit information big data, commercial bank and factoring, financing leasing, and other businesses in China. The company offers electrical equipment products, such as electronic control complete sets, permanent magnet low and high voltage switch products, and electronic energy meters, as well as highway part facility, automatic control system integration, and protection services. It also provides credit services, including credit management and rating system services; and digital retail management solutions consisting of channel collaborative retail management and large data operations management services, as well as product development services for online and offline enterprises. In addition, the company offers banking services comprising corporate and personal finance, small microfinance, financial market, and international business services; business factoring services, which include advance payment under warranty, factoring under credit protection, leasing factoring, re-factoring, and other services; and financial leasing services, such as direct, after-sale, entrusted, leveraged, and joint leasing services. Further, it provides insurance brokerage services primarily student and family insurance. The company was formerly known as Jilin Yongda Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Rongyu Group Co., Ltd. in November 2016. Rongyu Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Jilin City, China.

002639.SZ.summary: Fujian Snowman Co., Ltd. engages in the research, production, and distribution of ice machines in China. The company's principal products include industrial chillers and concrete cooling systems, as well as flake, tube, block, and plate ice machines. It also offers slurry ice and quick frozen machines, compressors, cold storage panels, evaporative condensers, and air coolers. The company provides its products for use in food processing and storage; man-made ski slopes; and cooling applications in construction, supermarkets, ocean fishing, nuclear projects, chemical and medical industries, etc. It offers its products under the SNOWKEY brand name. The company was formerly known as Change City Snowman Refrigeration Equipment Co., Ltd. Fujian Snowman Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

002645.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Huahong Technology Stock Co., Ltd.
002645.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Huahong Technology Stock Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells processing equipment for recycling resources in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company primarily offers scrap metal balers, shears, scrap metal shredders, waste automobile dismantling equipment, non-metal balers, and compressors, as well as household garbage products. Its products are applied to the national circular economy parks, national urban renewable resource bases, steel and nonferrous metal enterprises, waste steel processing centers, and household garbage processing centers. Jiangsu Huahong Technology Stock Co., Ltd. is based in Jiangyin, the People's Republic of China.

002651.SZ.summary: Chengdu Leejun Industrial Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and services material grinding and separation systems in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers roller presses and separators for use in the cement raw material, clinker grinding, metallurgical mining, and other fields. It also provides technical services; and spare parts for a range of products and auxiliary equipment. Chengdu Leejun Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

002665.SZ.summary: Shouhang High-Tech Energy Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and erection of air cooling system of power plant in China. The company offers direct air cooling condensers, evaporators, waste water zero emission systems, solar power tower systems, parabolic trough systems, and dish solar thermal power system. It also engages in waste heat generation, and waste heat heating and hot water activities. The company was formerly known as Beijing Shouhang Resources Saving Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Shouhang High-Tech Energy Co., Ltd. in December 2019. Shouhang High-Tech Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002686.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Yilida Ventilator Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sales of central air conditioner and building fans in China and internationally. It offers industrial fans, energy-saving motorized fan systems, ventilations, and axial fans. The company also provides automobile charger, DC converter, and other products that are used in electric vehicles, forklifts, golf carts, solar power, wind and electric power communications, rail systems, and other industries, as well as lightweight components, such as automotive transmission housing, engine box, retarder housing, etc. In addition, it offers vessel and marine protective, function, and composite materials for military and civilian markets; testing and checking facilities; and support services. The company offers its products under the Yilida, Wolter, Fulihua, Maer, ESSENTEC, AMMT, TC Charger, and Sanjin brand names. Zhejiang Yilida Ventilator Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Taizhou, China.

002689.SZ.long_name: Shenyang Yuanda Intellectual Industry Group Co., Ltd.
002689.SZ.summary: Shenyang Yuanda Intellectual Industry Group Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, installs, and services elevators, escalators, and passenger conveyors in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers passenger, panoramic, bed, and freight elevators; and home and dumbwaiter lifts. The company was formerly known as ShenYang Brilliant Elevator Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenyang Yuanda Intellectual Industry Group Co., Ltd. in December 2015. Shenyang Yuanda Intellectual Industry Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenyang, the People's Republic of China.

002690.SZ.summary: Hefei Meyer Optoelectronic Technology Inc. researches, develops, and sells optical sorting and X-ray inspection technologies. The company offers belt-type multi-function, chute multi-function, grain, herbs, mineral stone, nut, peanut, plastic infrared, pulses, rice, salt, seeds, sesame, spices, tea, vegetable, and wheat sorters. It also provides X-ray inspection machines for canned food, dehydrated vegetable, frozen food, meat, mushroom, seafood, shoes/clothes/bags, snacks, and tire inspection, as well as security inspection. In addition, the company offers double layer, pre-sale, helpdesk, onsite, warranty, spare parts, and training services. It primarily serves agricultural products processing, industrial inspection, and healthcare industries in approximately 100 countries. Hefei Meyer Optoelectronic Technology Inc. was founded in 1993 and is based in Hefei, China.

002698.SZ.summary: Harbin Boshi Automation Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of automatic weighting, bagging, and palletizing equipment for powdery and granular materials industry in China. It also provides post-processing equipment for synthetic rubber and petrochemical industries; and operating robot equipment for submerged arc furnaces. The company also provides automatic truck-loading equipment and plant logistic solutions; and industrial waste acid regeneration process equipment. In addition, it sells spare parts; and offers equipment maintenance, repair, and overhaul services. The company was formerly known as Harbin BOSHI Automation Equipment Co., Ltd. Harbin Boshi Automation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Harbin, China.

002747.SZ.summary: Estun Automation Co., Ltd. primarily manufactures and sells controlling parts for intelligent equipment in China. The company offers CNC systems for shearing machines, press brakes, hydraulic presses, and cut-to-length lines; electro-hydraulic servo systems; and solutions for security press brakes. It also provides AC servo and motion control systems, including AC servo drives and motors, electro hydraulic servo pump systems, motion control products, and digital field buses; industrial robots comprising six axis articulated, four axis palletizing, mini, SCARA and DELTA, and linear axes robots; and smart manufacturing systems for automobile, household appliance, elevator, energy, and construction machinery industries. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Nanjing, China.

002757.SZ.summary: Nanxing Machinery Co., Ltd. produces and sells furniture machinery and equipment in China and internationally. The company offers CNC machining centers and boring machines, computer panel saws and sliding table saws, single and double sided edge banding machines, multi boring machines, projects and production lines, package lines, automatic loading and unloading machines, changer machines, roller conveyors, and other related equipment. It also provides hydraulic cold press machines, shapers and routers, and lifting tables. In addition, it offers after-sale services. The company's products are used in the panel furniture industry, as well as in the fields of wooden chips boards, including doors, customer-made furniture, kitchen cabinets, exhibition display units, boat decoration, and others. The company was formerly known as Nanxing Furniture Machinery & Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nanxing Machinery Co., Ltd. in June 2016. Nanxing Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Dongguan, China.

002774.SZ.summary: IFE Elevators Co.,LTD. engages in the research and development, design, production, installation, and after-sales service of elevators and escalators for residential, commercial, and public applications worldwide. It offers passenger, home, high-speed, panoramic, hospital, freight, and car elevators; and escalators/moving walks. The company was formerly known as Dongguan IFE Elevators Co., Ltd. and changed its name to IFE Elevators Co.,LTD. in 2011. IFE Elevators Co.,LTD. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.

002795.SZ.long_name: Yorhe Fluid Intelligent Control Co., Ltd.
002795.SZ.summary: Yorhe Fluid Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells brass ball valves. The company offers ball valves for gas and water, ball valves with drain-offs, filter and check valves, boiler valves and brass fittings, angle valves, thermostatic mixing valves, British valves, bibcocks, and safety valves. It also provides PEX, press, compression, three way, bronze, and gas ball valves; tank less water heater valves; pump isolation valves; radiator valves and thermostatic valves; bathroom products; and basin waste products. Yorhe Fluid Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Taizhou, China.

002796.SZ.summary: Suzhou Shijia Science & Technology Inc. offers elevator system products, metal plate systems, and electrical assembly products. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

002801.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Weiguang Electronic Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells various fan motors primarily in China. Its products include electronically commutated and controlling motors, external rotor motors, shaded pole motors, terminal motors, plug motors, capacitance motors, and cross flow motors. The company also offers axial fans, centrifugal fans, fan blades, grids, rings, and brackets, as well as air flow products. Hangzhou Weiguang Electronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002816.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen HEKEDA Precision Cleaning Equipment Co., Ltd.
002816.SZ.summary: Shenzhen HEKEDA Precision Cleaning Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of LCD glass cleaning machines, ultrasound cleaning machines, plating equipment, and industrial water purifying equipment in China. The company offers flat panel cleaning equipment, ITO and TFT glass cleaning machines, touch panel cleaning machines, LCD glass cleaning machines, thin film solar cell cleaning machines, crystalline silicon solar equipment, auto glass cleaning machines, ultrasonic cleaning equipment, surface treatment equipment, water treatment equipment, and machine components and services, as well as precision cleaning equipment. It also provides pre-sales consulting and post-sales services. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen HEKEDA Liquid Crystal Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen HEKEDA Precision Cleaning Equipment Co., Ltd. in December 2012. Shenzhen HEKEDA Precision Cleaning Equipment Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002833.SZ.summary: Guangzhou KDT Machinery Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells machinery in China and internationally. It offers banding machine, sawing, CNC drilling, machining, and multi-row drill series of products. The company is based in Guangzhou, China.

002837.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Envicool Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells temperature control solutions and products in China. It offers AC and DC powered air conditioners, heat exchangers, and combo air conditioner for outdoor cabinets; and telecom site cooling solutions, including free cooling, split AC air conditioners, and split DC air conditioners. The company also provides industrial air conditioners, fans-and-filters, air/water heat exchangers, thermostats/hygrostats, heaters, oil coolers, and water coolers; transport cooling solutions; data center cooling solutions; door/wall mounted units; and floor standing units. Shenzhen Envicool Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002851.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Megmeet Electrical Co., LTD engages in the research and development, production, sales, and services of hardware, software, and system solutions for electrical automation in China. The company offers industrial power supply products, including telecommunication and IT system high-efficiency power supply, medical device power supply, industrial microwave power and control system, electric power supply, and customized industrial power supply; and industrial automation products comprising motor drive, programmable logic controller, and industrial digital smart welding machine. It also provides smart home appliances consisting of display power supply, smart sanitary ware, household microwave power and control system, HVAC and smart cooling controller, and other products; and new energy vehicle products, such as charging station rectifier module, PDU, on-board charger, electric vehicle DC/DC module, motor control unit, and other products. In addition, the company offers newly developed industries products comprising photovoltaic converter, industrial microwave system, smart electric shock controller, electric submersible progressing cavity pumping system, optical fiber flexible bend sensor, and e-cigarette. Its products are used in medical, communications, IT, electricity, transportation, photovoltaic, oil field, police equipment, industrial welding machine, industrial microwave, frequency conversion air conditioning, frequency conversion microwave, laptop display, outdoor color screen, intelligent bathroom, and other industries. The company also operates in approximately 40 countries, including European countries, the United States, India, Brazil, South Korea, Japan, and internationally. Shenzhen Megmeet Electrical Co., LTD was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002871.SZ.summary: Qingdao Weflo Valve Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells valve and fire hydrant products for the fire protection, waterworks, HVAC, and industrial markets worldwide. It offers fire protection, check, gate, pressure and air relief, ball, flap, pressure reducing, plug, plunger, globe, butterfly, balancing, and foot valves, as well as strainers, backflow prevention devices, and rubber expansion joints. The company is based in Qingdao, China.

002884.SZ.summary: Guangdong Lingxiao Pump Industry Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells small household and industry support electric pumps primarily in China. The company offers stainless steel, fitness and entertainment, submersible, cast iron, and pipeline pumps, as well as IEC motors. Its products are used for reverse osmosis water treatment, central air conditioning, frequency conversion constant pressure water supply, machine tool, massage bath crock, spa, domestic pool integration, mariculture, fountain, sewage treatment, irrigation, ornamental fish pond, solar hot water circulation, household water pressurization, agricultural cultivation water supply, pressurized water heater, fan, air compressor, and woodworking machinery applications. The company also exports its products to approximately 100 countries or regions worldwide. Guangdong Lingxiao Pump Industry Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Yangchun, China.

002896.SZ.long_name: Ningbo ZhongDa Leader Intelligent Transmission Co., Ltd.
002896.SZ.summary: Ningbo ZhongDa Leader Intelligent Transmission Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells motor transmission, micro motor, and high precision gearbox products in China and internationally. It offers RV planetary gear boxes, high precision planetary gearboxes, transmission planetary gearboxes, DC brushless gear motors, hypoid gear motors, roller motors, AC and DC gear motors, small AC gear motors, electric forklift gear motors, power assisted steering and driving wheel gear motors, automatic door motors and sweeping gear motors, and controllers. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Cixi, China.

002903.SZ.summary: Yuhuan CNC Machine Tool Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, and services CNC machine tools for grinding and polishing in China, Taiwan, Vietnam, Portugal, Russia, Kenya, Brazil, and internationally. The company offers double surface, camshaft, and valve grinders; single, double, and complex surface lapping/polishing machines; intelligent equipment, including MT line, packing, and microelectronics automation equipment; and piston rings equipment, as well as magnetic polishing and disc grinding machines. Its products have applications in the areas of automotive, IT electronics, bearings, seals, household appliances, and others. The company was formerly known as Hunan Yuhuan Tongxin Numerical Control Machine Tool Co., Ltd. Yuhuan CNC Machine Tool Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Changsha, China.

002931.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Fenglong Electric Co., Ltd. develops, designs, manufactures, and sells components and parts for garden equipment and automotive industries in China. It offers ignition coils, flywheels, and cylinders for use in various garden power tools, such as trimmers, chainsaws, and hedge trimmers; ABS valves, thermostat covers, and tensioners that are used in automotive systems comprising transmission, brake, and thermostat systems; and other components. The company also exports its products. It primarily operates under the Fenglong brand name. The company serves garden power manufacturers and automotive enterprises. Zhejiang Fenglong Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Shangyu, China.

002943.SZ.summary: Hunan Yujing Machinery Co., Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, and sells lapping/polishing machines, multi-wire saws, and relevant spare parts. The company offers multi wire saw machines, double-side lapping/polishing machines, single-side lapping/polishing machines, and consumable parts. It serves mobile touch screen, solar photovoltaic, magnetic materials, and sapphire industries. Hunan Yujing Machinery Co., Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Yiyang, China.

002957.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Colibri Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the production, sale, and technical service of automation equipment and precision parts in China. It offers automated testing and assembly equipment; and automated equipment accessories, such as regular testing machine pallets, smart phone testing platform fixtures, antenna wavelength testing fixtures, and ABT press switch fixtures. The company also provides precision machining, tools, and dies, including high-speed grinders high-speed turning, milling, boring machines, electrical discharge machines, low-speed cutters, coordinate measuring machines, alimeters, CNC turning centers, and CNC machining centers. Its products are used in communication, clean energy, e-cigarette, automotive, HDD, medical and health, and logistic applications. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002975.SZ.summary: Zhuhai Bojay Electronics Co. Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of industrial automation equipment and accessories. The company offers automation, RF test, acoustic test, in-circuit test, optical test, and vision test solutions; and related technical services. Its products are used in testing and product assembly of electronic products. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Zhuhai, China.

003025.SZ.long_name: Sijin Intelligent Forming Machinery Co., Ltd.
003025.SZ.summary: Sijin Intelligent Forming Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of multi-station high-speed automatic cold forming equipment and die casting equipment in China. It offers cold forging machines, special part and nut formers, nut-former machines, one die two blow headers, and die casting machines. The company is based in Ningbo, China.

003036.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Taitan Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of textile machines in China. It offers spinning, weaving, twisting, and dyeing machinery, as well as textile equipment. The company also exports its products internationally. Zhejiang Taitan Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Xinchang, China.

0187.HK.long_name: Beijing Jingcheng Machinery Electric Company Limited
0187.HK.summary: Beijing Jingcheng Machinery Electric Company Limited manufactures and sells gas storage and transportation equipment. It offers liquefied natural gas (LNG) cylinders for vehicles, compressed natural gas cylinders for vehicles, seamless steel gas cylinders, steel welded gas cylinders, welded insulated cylinders, carbon fiber full-winding compound gas cylinders, plate-type asbestos-free acetylene cylinders, ISO tank containers, aluminum carbon fiber full-winding compound gas cylinders for fuel cells, as well as cryogenic tanks and LNG filling station equipment. The company is also involved in the production and sale of gas cylinders accumulator shells, pressure vessels and auxiliary equipment, etc.; and various activities, including import and export trade, consultancy services, etc. Its products are used in automotive, chemical, firefighting, medical, petroleum, energy, urban construction, food, metallurgy, machinery, electronics, and other industries. It operates in the People's Republic of China, the United States, Singapore, Korea, India, Australia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Beiren Printing Machinery Holding Company Limited and changed its name to Beijing Jingcheng Machinery Electric Company Limited in December 2013. Beijing Jingcheng Machinery Electric Company Limited was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

0658.HK.long_name: China High Speed Transmission Equipment Group Co., Ltd.
0658.HK.summary: China High Speed Transmission Equipment Group Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of high-speed and heavy-duty gears for wind-turbine gearboxes and transmission systems. The company focuses on wind energy gearboxes, rail vehicle gearboxes, industrial gearboxes, and robot reducers. Its products are used in China and international markets. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

1133.HK.summary: Harbin Electric Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells power plant equipment in the People's Republic of China. It provides thermal power main equipment, including boilers, steam turbines, and steam turbine generators; hydropower main equipment, such as hydropower generators units; nuclear power main equipment comprising nuclear island and conventional island equipment; and a set of steam power equipment, including 9F/9H class gas turbine, and combined gas and steam cycle sets. The company also engages in the research and development, and production of clean energy products comprising solar energy, tidal power, and desalination products; and ancillary equipment for power stations, industrial boilers, industrial steam turbines, control devices, and AC/DC motors, as well as valves for power stations, pressure vessels, axial compressors, etc. In addition, it is involved in the construction of power station projects; servicing of thermal and hydropower equipment; import and export of equipment for power stations; provision of after sales service for power station equipment products; research and development of engineering technology for power equipment and its ancillary products; and provision of environmental protection engineering services, such as desulfurization, denitrification, and dust removal. The company also exports its products to Asia and South America. Harbin Electric Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Harbin, the People's Republic of China. Harbin Electric Company Limited is a subsidiary of Harbin Electric Corporation Co., Ltd.

1289.HK.long_name: Wuxi Sunlit Science and Technology Company Limited
1289.HK.summary: Wuxi Sunlit Science and Technology Company Limited engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, equipment supply, installation, testing, repair, and maintenance of production lines for manufacturing steel wire products in the People's Republic of China. Its products include brass electroplating wire production lines, intermediate wire heat treatment lines, wire rod pretreatment lines, double-twist stranding machines, and wet drawing machines, as well as other machines, such as grinding mills, angle grinders, grinding machines, chemical corrosion-resistant troughs, steel wire surface induction heating diffusion equipment, and heat-treatment lead pots. The company is also involved in the trading of machinery products; and software development and software patent rights trading activities. Its products are used in various industries, including radial tire cords, bead wires, sawing wires, hose wires, precision steel wires, and others. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China.

1645.HK.long_name: Haina Intelligent Equipment International Holdings Limited
1645.HK.summary: Haina Intelligent Equipment International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, designs, produces, and sells automated machines for manufacturing disposable hygiene products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers machines for baby diapers, adult diapers, lady sanitary napkins, and medical disposable face masks, as well as related components and parts under the Haina Machinery brand. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Jinjiang, the People's Republic of China. Haina Intelligent Equipment International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Prestige Name International Limited.

1673.HK.summary: Huazhang Technology Holding Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of industrial automation systems and sludge treatment products in the People's Republic of China. It operates through four segments: Industrial Products, Project Contracting Services, Environmental Products, and Supporting Services. The company offers paper-making machines and equipment; design, procurement, and installation services; and wastewater treatment and waste recycling services. It also provides after-sales services; computer software and hardware, and technical services; and logistics and warehousing services. In addition, Huazhang Technology Holding Limited trades in electronic parts; and engages in the research, development, and distribution of head boxes used in papermaking production line. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China. Huazhang Technology Holding Limited is a subsidiary of Florescent Holdings Limited.

1786.HK.summary: CRCC High-Tech Equipment Corporation Limited researches, develops, manufactures, and sells large railway track maintenance machinery in Mainland China and internationally. Its railway track maintenance machines include tamping machines; ballast cleaning machines; stabilization machines; ballast regulators; materials logistics machines; and rail processing machines; as well as other machines, such as catenary inspection and maintenance machines, catenary installation machines, and other large railway track maintenance machines. The company manufactures, purchases, and sells various parts and components comprising bogies, electrical control systems, working devices, wheelsets, transmissions, pumps, valves, motors, and drive shafts. It also provides overhaul services, including repairs, upgradation, and remanufacturing services; and railway lines maintenance services for newly built and existing railway lines. The company was formerly known as Kunming China Railway Large Maintenance Machinery Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to CRCC High-Tech Equipment Corporation Limited in June 2015. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Kunming, China. CRCC High-Tech Equipment Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of China Railway Construction Corporation Limited.

200530.SZ.long_name: Bingshan Refrigeration & Heat Transfer Technologies Co., Ltd.
200530.SZ.summary: Bingshan Refrigeration & Heat Transfer Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, sale, installation, and maintenance of industrial and commercial refrigeration and air-conditioning equipment in China. It also engages in refrigerated and frozen food storage business; and the provision of after-sales, maintenance, warranty, and other services. The company was formerly known as Dalian Refrigeration Company Limited and changed its name to Bingshan Refrigeration & Heat Transfer Technologies Co., Ltd. in December 2019. The company was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in Dalian, China.

200570.SZ.summary: Changchai Company, Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells small and medium-sized single cylinder and multi-cylinder diesel engines under the Changchai brand in the People's Republic of China. Its diesel engines are used in tractors, combine harvesters, light commercial vehicles, agriculture equipment, small-sized construction machinery, generating sets, ship machines, etc. The company also provides diesel engine fittings and castings, gasoline engines, gasoline engine fittings, rotovators, walking tractors, molds, and jigs. In addition, it engages in the assembly and sale of diesel engine and gasoline engine supporting sets. Further, the company provides external investment and consulting services; and Real estate management services. The company exports its products. Changchai Company, Limited was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Changzhou, the People's Republic of China.

200771.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Steam Turbine Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, sells, and services steam turbines, gas turbines, and auxiliary turbines in China. The company also offers marine steam turbines and nuclear power emergency pump steam turbines; other rotating and to-and-fro machinery; and spare parts and components, and related after-sales services. It engages in the sale, import, and export of power plant, industrial driving, turbine equipment, and energy conservation and environmental protection projects. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China. Hangzhou Steam Turbine Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Hangzhou Steam Turbine & Power Group Co., Ltd.
