2208.HK.long_name: Xinjiang Goldwind Science & Technology Co., Ltd.
2208.HK.summary: Xinjiang Goldwind Science & Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides wind power solutions in China and internationally. It operates through four segments: WTG Manufacturing, Wind Power Services, Wind Farm Development, and Other Business. The company engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of wind turbine generators and wind power components; development, construction, maintenance, operation, and sale of wind farms; and provision of wind power related consultancy and maintenance services. It is also involved in the manufacture and sale of wind power equipment and accessories; development and operation of water treatment plants; provision of finance leasing services; and development and operation of solar power generation projects. Xinjiang Goldwind Science & Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Urumqi, China.

2338.HK.summary: Weichai Power Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells diesel engines, automobiles, and other major automobile components in China and internationally. It operates through Engines, Automobiles and Automobile Components, and Intelligent Logistics segments. The company provides design, development, production, sale, repair, and import and export of engines and auxiliary products, automobile axles, gear boxes and components, and other automobile components; hydraulic pumps and motors; hydraulic valves; gears and gear transmission devices; ancillary casting and casting products of hydraulic components; internal combustion engines, energy powertrain systems and ancillary products; technical consultation and technical services; leasing of self-owned houses; steel; business management services; and forklift trucks, and warehousing technology and supply chain solution services. It offers its products under various brands, including Weichai Power Engine, Fast Gear, Hande Axle, Shacman Heavy Truck, and Linder Hydraulics. Weichai Power Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Weifang, the People's Republic of China.

2722.HK.summary: Chongqing Machinery & Electric Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and sells clean energy equipment and high-end smart manufacturing equipment. It manufactures and sells engines, hydroelectric generation equipment, electrical wires and cables, general machinery, machinery tools, high-voltage transformers, and other products. The company also designs, manufactures, and sells vehicle parts and components; industrial robots, intelligent equipment, etc.; processes electronic products; develops, produces, and leases laser, machinery, and testing equipment; turbines, governors, and auxiliary devices; gear processing machine tools and lathes; automation, intelligent equipment, and accessories; provides cotton picking services and maintains cotton machinery and spare parts; cutting tool; casting and forging of non-ferrous metal smelting and special metal smelting; electrical porcelain; agricultural machinery and accessories, special machine tools, spare parts, and special tooling; precision screw; multi-purpose CNC machine tools, roll grinders, and deep hole boring machines. In addition, it leases properties; engages in turbo mechanical product testing, equipment, and system maintenance and transformation; sewage collection, treatment, and operation management BOT business; other trade business; trades in machinery and raw materials; fan coolers; evaporative cooling, water-cooled, and air-cooled chillers; manufactures wind-power equipment, PPR\PPC tubular product, and gas compressors and components; sells network, environmental, and gas products; design and manufactures industrial pumps and parts, and pressure vessels; mechanical and electrical equipment technology; and sells steel, as well as provides loans. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Chongqing, the People's Republic of China. Chongqing Machinery & Electric Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Chongqing Machinery and Electronics Holding (Group) Co., Ltd.

300004.SZ.summary: Nanfang Ventilator Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures HVAC products in China. The company offers axial flow fan, and centrifugal blower fans; seamless and stainless steel pipes, forge pieces, carbon steel products, and alloy steel pipes; and nuclear fans and dampers. Its products are used in nuclear power, petrochemical, coal chemical, metro, tunnel and civil architecture, and other industries. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Foshan, China.

300018.SZ.long_name: Wuhan Zhongyuan Huadian Science & Technology Co.,Ltd.
300018.SZ.summary: Wuhan Zhongyuan Huadian Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the smart grid, medical health, and industrial investment businesses in China. The company is involved in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and service of power system dynamic recording systems, power system time synchronization and measurement systems, intelligent power grid instrumentation systems, 110kV and below voltage level substation integrated automation systems, intelligent distribution network scheduling systems, and energy Internet system integration and intelligent equipment, as well as medical information and clinical in vitro diagnostic related products. It also provides energy Internet planning, design, operation and maintenance, and consulting services. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Wuhan, China.

300023.SZ.summary: Bode Energy Equipment Co., Ltd engages in the research, design, manufacture, and control system integration of industrial automation products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers drilling rig AC variable frequency drive, drilling rig DC drive, compound drive drilling rig electrical, top drive, auto-drilling, and specific drilling rig electrical control systems, as well as TV monitor systems and flush type integrated oil production management systems for use in the petroleum industry. It also provides galvanizing line and draw bending flattener control systems for use in the metallurgy industry, as well as special equipment and hydrodynamic force test control systems. The company is based in Xi'an, the People's Republic of China.

300024.SZ.summary: Siasun Robot&Automation Co.,Ltd. operates in robotic industry in China. It offers collaborative, mobile, intelligent, industrial, and service robots; chassis marriage and assembly AGV, spot welding, and intelligent logistic systems; AS/RS systems; electronics assembly systems; automated vertical warehouse systems; and automated charging and swapping systems. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Shenyang, China.

300031.SZ.summary: Wuxi Boton Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the industrial bulk material handling and mobile Internet businesses. It offers heat resistance, steel cord, flame retardant, conveyer, and fabric belts. The company provides its solutions for mining, steel, cement, port and dock, and coal industries. It also offers mobile Internet services for the distribution and operation of mobile games. The company was formerly known as Wuxi Boton Belt Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wuxi Boton Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2015. Wuxi Boton Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Wuxi, China.

300032.SZ.summary: Jinlong Machinery & Electronic Co.,Ltd engages in the research, production, and sale of mini motors in China and internationally. It offers micro motors, including solid motors, coin type vibrators, and driving motors; and optoelectronics, such as mobile phone and notebook camera modules. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Yueqing, China.

300035.SZ.summary: Hunan Zhongke Electric Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells electromagnetic metallurgy products in China. It offers continuous casting electromagnetic stirring sets, induction heating packages, high-voltage inverters, lifting magnets, rectification control equipment, cable reels, and separators. The company also provides technical services. It primarily serves iron and steel, transport, shipbuilding, machinery, mining, and other industries. The company also exports its products. Hunan Zhongke Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Yueyang, China.

300040.SZ.summary: Harbin Jiuzhou Group Co.,Ltd. manufactures and supplies electrical equipment and energy efficiency management solutions in China and internationally. The company offers power products, including batteries; and power quality management products, which comprise high and low voltage reactive power compensation products. It also provides transformers and reactors, prefabricated box types, busbars and bridges, terminals, and distribution automation products; low voltage switch complete set equipment; medium voltage switchgears comprising gas insulated medium voltage and air insulation medium voltage switchgears; and electrical components that include medium voltage switching components and low voltage dual power transfer switches. In addition, the company offers high-voltage motor drive products, including high voltage and low voltage soft starters, and high and low voltage inverters; new energy grid-connected converters and supporting products, such as megawatt level wind power converters; and power engineering installation and construction products. Further, it offers energy saving and energy efficiency management, city and infrastructure, rail transportation, distribution automation, building technology, industry, mine, new energy, data center, and reactive power compensation and harmonic control solutions. The company was formerly known as Harbin Jiuzhou Electrical Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Harbin Jiuzhou Group Co.,Ltd. in July 2020. Harbin Jiuzhou Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Harbin, China.

300056.SZ.long_name: Xiamen Zhongchuang Environmental Technology Co., Ltd.
300056.SZ.summary: Xiamen Zhongchuang Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, and services high temperature dust and bag filters in China and internationally. The company offers flue gas island control products; and bulk material storage systems, as well as invests in and operates energy conservation and environmental protection, and clean energy power plants. It also provides third party environmental services, import and export services, and investment services. The company was formerly known as Xiamen Savings Environmental Co., Ltd and changed its name to Xiamen Zhongchuang Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2020. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

300062.SZ.summary: Ceepower Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of pre-molded cable connectors, and primary and secondary equipment for power grids in China. The company offers pre-molded cable connectors, cable branch boxes, indoor or outdoor main ring units, high and low voltage switchgear kits, box-type substations, power quality management devices, and primary and secondary equipment for power transmission and distribution system, such as FTU, DTU, etc; and green energy products, charging equipment for electric vehicle, equipment for photovoltaic power generation system, etc. It also provides cable accessories and solar products. The company's services include electric equipment manufacture, total package of EPC project for power system, contribution and operation of BOT and PPP projects, etc. Its products are used in power distribution, petrochemical power, urban rail transit, and electrified railway systems, as well as metallurgical enterprises and other industries. The company was formerly known as Fujian CEE Installations Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ceepower Co., Ltd. in December 2015. Ceepower Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

300066.SZ.summary: Sanchuan Wisdom Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells water meters under the San Chuan brand. The company offers intelligent card type, stainless steel, water saving type, network remote transmission, direct reading electronic remote transmission, compound, and mechanical water meters. It also provides multi-family condominium water supply systems; and water company management and application software, as well as water supply products, drainage pipes, pipe fittings, etc. Sanchuan Wisdom Technology Co., Ltd. markets its products in Southeast Asia, the United States, Africa, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Jiangxi Sanchuan Water Meter Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sanchuan Wisdom Technology Co., Ltd. in January 2016. Sanchuan Wisdom Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Yingtan, China.

300092.SZ.long_name: Sichuan Kexin Mechanical and Electrical Equipment Co.,Ltd
300092.SZ.summary: Sichuan Kexin Mechanical and Electrical Equipment Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, installs, and sells various pressure vessels and civil nuclear safety machinery in China. The company offers petrochemical, nuclear power and military, conventional power plant, and clean and new energy, as well as oilfield environmental protection equipment; and welding and lifting, cutting and forming, NDT, test and inspection, and heat treatment equipment. It also engages in import and export activities. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shifang, China.

300097.SZ.summary: Dalian Zhiyun Automation Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, and system integration of automation machines in China. It offers auto test, convey, assembly, and debur machines, as well as wash and filter machines; and assembly line products. The company was formerly known as Dalian Zhiyun Machine Tool Auxiliary Machine Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Dalian Zhiyun Automation Co., Ltd. in May 2008. Dalian Zhiyun Automation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Dalian, China.

300105.SZ.long_name: YanTai LongYuan Power Technology Co., Ltd.
300105.SZ.summary: YanTai LongYuan Power Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, installation, and commissioning and consulting in energy saving and environment protection in thermal power generating area. It offers various products and technologies, including plasma ignition and combustion stabilizing systems for pulverized coal-fired boiler; dual-scale low NOx combustion technology; wall-fired low NOx combustion technology; flame video monitor, a visual image flame detection technology; boiler waster heat comprehensive utilization technology; and other technologies, including few fuel-oil ignition and pulverized coal combustion software. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Yantai, China.

300129.SZ.long_name: Shanghai Taisheng Wind Power Equipment Co., Ltd.
300129.SZ.summary: Shanghai Taisheng Wind Power Equipment Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells wind towers in China. Its wind towers support various kinds of turbines from 100KW to 3MW. The company was formerly known as Ruian Pressure Vessel Factory and changed its name to Shanghai Taisheng Wind Power Equipment Co., Ltd. in 2009. Shanghai Taisheng Wind Power Equipment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300145.SZ.summary: Nanfang Zhongjin Environment Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, operates in the environmental protection industry. It provides ecological improvement and environmental protection services. The company offers environmental consulting and design services, such as consulting, design, supervision and inspection, and construction; and general equipment manufacturing services consisting of vertical and horizontal multistage centrifugal pumps, water supply equipment, sewage pumps, inline pumps, split casing pumps, fire pumps, metering pumps, lubrication pumps, deep well pumps, and other products for use in water purification, building water supply, HVAC system, pharmaceutical, and electronic cleaning and other industries. It also provides hazardous waste treatment services; and sewage and sludge treatment services comprising water treatment equipment manufacturing and environmental engineering contracting, as well as sewage, sludge, and cyanobacteria reutilization treatment. The company was formerly known as Nanfang Pump Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nanfang Zhongjin Environment Co., Ltd. in March 2016. Nanfang Zhongjin Environment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

300153.SZ.summary: Shanghai Cooltech Power Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells intelligent power generation equipment. The company offers nuclear safety class; telecommunication base; and vehicle-mounted power station, as well as power integration solutions. Its products are used in IDC, telecommunications, nuclear power station, aviation, petroleum, petrochemical, defense, and various other industries. The company was formerly known as Cooltech Power (Shanghai) Ltd. and changed its name to Shanghai Cooltech Power Co., Ltd. in 2008. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300154.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Riland Industry Group Co., Ltd
300154.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Riland Industry Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and services inverter welding and cutting equipment, welding automated devices, welding accessories, and labor protection appliances worldwide. The company offers inverter welding and cutting equipment, including inverter MMA/TIG/MIG/air plasma cutting machines; and welding automated devices, such as integrated system of welding robots, automatic welding carriages, digitalized intelligent welding equipment, welding systems, etc. It also provides welding accessories and labor protection appliances comprising welding and cutting accessories, and auto darkening welding helmets; and consumables. The company offers its products primarily under the Riland, Rilon, HiTronic, T&R, and Good brands through dealers, sub-dealers, and 300 exclusive shops. Its products are primarily used in military, aerospace, construction, machinery manufacturing, shipbuilding, steel structures, marine engineering, vehicle manufacturing, electricity, pipeline, chemical construction, boilers, bridge building, and manufacturing industries. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

300161.SZ.long_name: Wuhan Huazhong Numerical Control System, Inc.
300161.SZ.summary: Wuhan Huazhong Numerical Control System, Inc. researches, develops, produces, and sells CNC products worldwide. The company offers CNC controllers for turning machines, milling machines, and machining centers; CNC machines; servo drives and motors; and machine tools. Its CNC products are used in various industries, such as textile and mechanical industries for machine automation; and educational centers for technical personnel training. The company also provides infrared products, including fever scan thermal cameras, infrared monitoring systems, path finders, night vision thermal cameras, and portable infrared thermography products that are used in energy, medical, chemical, and steel industries. In addition, it offers services comprising product commissioning and maintenance, CNC technical training, and consulting services. The company was formerly known as Wuhan Huazhong Numerical Control Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Wuhan Huazhong Numerical Control System, Inc. in April 2021. Wuhan Huazhong Numerical Control System, Inc. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

300173.SZ.summary: Funeng Oriental Equipment Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells various machines used in printing, packaging, and equipment industries in China. It offers rotogravure printing machines for packaging and decorating paper, woodgrain paper, printing machine, and poly paper, as well as solvent-free gravure printing machines. The company also provides maintenance, professional, and technical solutions. The company was formerly known as Sotech Smarter Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Funeng Oriental Equipment Technology Co., Ltd. in August 2020. Funeng Oriental Equipment Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Zhongshan, China.

300195.SZ.summary: Masterwork Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells printing and packaging equipment in China and internationally. It offers cold foil stamping, die cutting, foil stamping, folder gluer, inkjet, inspection, and packer machines. The company was formerly known as Masterwork Machinery Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Masterwork Group Co., Ltd. in July 2017. Masterwork Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Tianjin, China.

300201.SZ.long_name: Xuzhou Handler Special Vehicle Co., Ltd.
300201.SZ.summary: Xuzhou Handler Special Vehicle Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aerial work platforms in China. It offers vehicle-mounted mobile elevating work platform; electric power supporting vehicles; fire trucks; fire robots; LED intelligent power products; robot integrated applications; and robot education, as well as customization products. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Xuzhou, China.

300217.SZ.long_name: Zhenjiang Dongfang Electric Heating Technology Co., Ltd.
300217.SZ.summary: Zhenjiang Dongfang Electric Heating Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells various electric heaters in China. Its product portfolio comprises electric heaters and assembly elements for household cabinet types; auxiliary heaters in central air-conditioners; defrosting heaters; fin type stainless steel electric heaters; ceramic PTC and metallic PTC heaters; electric heaters for water heating; open coil electric heaters; crankcase heating bands for compressors; heaters with single-end wiring; roasting heaters; electric heater elements for household electric appliances; electric wiring products; and heating bands. The company also provides wind channel heating element; defrosting heaters for cars; aluminum fin heaters; storage tank insertion type electric heaters; and casting aluminum type electric heaters. Zhenjiang Dongfang Electric Heating Technology Co., Ltd. offers its products for use in the air conditioning and refrigeration equipment, household appliances, electric vehicle, polycrystalline silicon manufacturing, petroleum, natural gas, chemical, nuclear power, military, power, railways, ships, machinery, and medical and health industries. The company also exports its products to the United States, Canada, Russia, France, Italy, Japan, South Korea, Saudi Arabia, Israel, and internationally. Zhenjiang Dongfang Electric Heating Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Zhenjiang, China.

300220.SZ.summary: Wuhan Golden Laser Co., Ltd manufactures and sells laser systems used in various applications in China. The company offers CO2, vision, flatbed, fiber, and tube laser cutters; label laser die cutters; and galvo laser and bridge laser machines. It serves the cloth filtration, dye sublimation, digital printed label, leather and shoe, garment tailoring, airbag, home textile, material testing, and materials processing industries. Wuhan Golden Laser Co., Ltd also exports its laser products to approximately 100 countries. The company was formerly known as Wuhan Goldenlaser Equipments Manufacturing Co Ltd and changed its name to Wuhan Golden Laser Co., Ltd in June 2009. Wuhan Golden Laser Co., Ltd was founded in 2005 and is based in Wuhan, China.

300228.SZ.long_name: Zhangjiagang Furui Special Equipment Co., Ltd.
300228.SZ.summary: Zhangjiagang Furui Special Equipment Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures integrated solutions for the LNG industry in China and internationally. It engages in the natural gas liquefaction, storage, transportation, and loading and unloading, as well as terminal applications; and heavy-duty pressure vessels, vehicle motors remanufacturing, hydrogen energy equipment, and Internet of Things. It also provides cryogenic liquid transportation and storage equipment, LNG marine tanks, Cleansky, and Speed tank gas supply systems; LNG/L-CNG vehicle refueling devices; LNG vehicle gas supply systems; cryogenic valves; engine remanufacturing and oil-to-gas products; heavy duty equipment; hydrogen energy; and Changlong petrolchemical equipment. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Zhangjiagang, China.

300257.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Kaishan Compressor Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells air compressors. The company offers stationary and portable air compressors, blowers, screw and reciprocating gas compressors, and screw compressor systems. It also provides refrigeration systems, screw vapor compressors, centrifugal compressors, pressure vessels, and foundry parts. In addition, the company offers industry waste pressure power generation, industry waste heat power generation, geothermal power generation, and biomass power generation equipment. It sells its products through approximately 2,000 sales outlets in China, as well as exports its products to approximately 60 countries, including Australia, Germany, Japan, South Korea, and Russia. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Quzhou, China. Zhejiang Kaishan Compressor Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Kaishan Holding Group Co., Ltd.

300260.SZ.summary: Kunshan Kinglai Hygienic Materials Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells components for hygienic fluid pipeline system and ultrahigh vacuum (UHV) system in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers sterile diaphragm valves, hygienic valves, hygienic pumps, pipes and fittings, tank equipment, filters, vacuum chambers, sanitary pumps, valves, flanges, heat exchangers, and bioprocess products, as well as AdvanTorr vacuum products and NanoClean ultra clean products; fine chemical engineering; and vacuum semiconductors. KINGLAI Group provides professional accessories and pipelines for processing and application fields of food, dairy products, beverage, personal care, biotechnology and pharmaceuticals. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Kunshan, the People's Republic of China.

300263.SZ.summary: Longhua Technology Group Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells heat transfer and energy-saving equipment. It offers air cooled condensers, composite cooling products, and smart compound closed cooling towers for the petrochemical industry; direct air cooling condensation systems, compound-type air cooling condensation systems, evaporative condensers, and bundles for the power industry; and evaporative coolers for the metallurgical industry. The company was formerly known as Luoyang Longhua Heat Transfer and Energy Conservation Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Longhua Technology Group Co.,Ltd. in September 2018. Longhua Technology Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Luoyang, China.

300266.SZ.summary: Xingyuan Environment Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the environmental protection industry in China. It offers water treatment technologies for the urban water supply industry; develops municipal sewage treatment solutions; develops industrial wastewater treatment processes for the projects covering pulping and papermaking, food and yeast, textile printing and dyeing, pharmacy, chemical, metallurgy, and other fields; and provides sewage treatment technology systems. The company also offers products for the reuse of reclaimed water; filter products for use in chemical, metallurgy, petroleum, printing and dyeing, ceramics, food, pharmacy, building material, coal washing, mine, sewage treatment, and other industries; and integrated solutions to users on energy utilization analysis, metallurgy, chemical, light industry, food, textile printing and dyeing, etc., as well as generates electricity from waste incineration. In addition, it provides landscape architecture services in the fields of river system, lake and reservoir, garden, road, square, green belt, etc.; mining land rehabilitation services; valley harnessing services; and reservoir environment governance services. The company was formerly known as Hangzhou Xingyuan Filter Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xingyuan Environment Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2015. Xingyuan Environment Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

300278.SZ.long_name: Huachangda Intelligent Equipment Group Co., Ltd.
300278.SZ.summary: Huachangda Intelligent Equipment Group Co., Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells intelligent automation equipment for automakers and engineering machinery manufacturers in China and internationally. Its products include friction, plot overhead, skid, product release chain, and reciprocating rod conveyor systems, as well as distributed control vehicle systems. The company also provides on-site installation and debugging, after-sales, and other services. Its products have applications in automobile manufacturing, engineering machinery, logistics and storage, and electronic appliances industries. The company was formerly known as Hubei Huachangda Intelligent Equipment Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Huachangda Intelligent Equipment Group Co., Ltd. in August 2017. Huachangda Intelligent Equipment Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Shiyan, China.

300280.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Zitian Media Technology Co., Ltd
300280.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Zitian Media Technology Co., Ltd designs, manufactures, and sells hydraulic press equipment in China. The company offers forging hydraulic press, mechanical press, and professional press; and individualized metal forming and systematic solutions. It offers its products for use in various fields, such as automobiles, shipping, traffic, energy, and others. The company sells its products in approximately 30 provinces and cities of China, as well as exports its products to the United States, Europe, Japan, and other countries in south-eastern Asia. It sells its products under the Qin Hua brand name. The company was formerly known as Nantong Metalforming Equipment Co., Ltd and changed its name to Jiangsu Zitian Media Technology Co., Ltd. in July 2018. Jiangsu Zitian Media Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Rugao, China.

300281.SZ.summary: Guangdong Jinming Machinery Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells blown film, cast film, and stretch film lines in China and internationally. It provides PE, PP, EVOH, TIE, and EVA resin mono-/multi-layer films, packaging films, agricultural films, shrink films, barrier films, etc.; and mono-/multi-layer films, infusion bags, barrier films, thermal forming films, etc. The company also offers mono-/multi-layer cast films, mulch films, CPP, CPE, barrier films, breathable films, etc.; and BOPP films, BOPET films, machine direction orientated films, etc. In addition, it offers coating and laminators; and extrusion coating and lamination lines. Its products are used in food and commodity packing, agriculture, medical, automotive, electronic, construction, consumer goods packaging, industrial heavy duty packaging, printing and lamination, geomembrane film, breathable film, and infusion bag, solar PV, and other applications. Guangdong Jinming Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.

300307.SZ.summary: Ningbo Cixing Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells knitting machinery in China and internationally. Its products include flat knitting machines, steiger, circular machines, shoe and ironing machines, industrial robots, knitting equipment, and other products. The company also provides after-sales and technical support services. Ningbo Cixing Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Ningbo, China.

300308.SZ.summary: Zhongji Innolight Co., Ltd. researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells intelligent equipment in China and internationally. The company offers motor stator coil winding equipment for use in various motor manufacturing fields, such as household electrical appliances, small and medium-sized industrial motors, automotive generators, and driving motors of new energy vehicles. It also provides optical communication transceiver modules for customers in data centers, data communications, long-distance transmission, wireless networks, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Shandong Zhongji Electrical Equipment Co., Ltd and changed its name to Zhongji Innolight Co., Ltd. in September 2017. Zhongji Innolight Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Longkou, China.

300332.SZ.summary: Top Resource Conservation & Environment Corp. engages in the gas, water, and energy conservation and environmental protection businesses. The company is in involved in natural gas supply and pipeline operations; the provision of water treatment engineering services; and the research and development, production, and sale membrane products. It also engages in waste heat power generation energy conservation, flue gas treatment investment, and engineering activities. The company was formerly known as Top Resource Conservation Engineering Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Top Resource Conservation & Environment Corp. Top Resource Conservation & Environment Corp. was founded in 2007 and is based in Beijing, China.

300334.SZ.summary: Tianjin MOTIMO Membrane Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of membrane materials, processes, modules, and equipment. Its products include hollow fiber UF and MF membrane element and equipment; FP membrane modules; submerged membrane filtration membrane modules; and drinking water devices. The company's membranes, equipment, and systems are used in the treatment of municipal wastewater and industrial water, such as power plant, steel, textile, domestic, petrochemical, food, drinking water, sea water pre-treatment, and other industries. It also provides technical guidance and after-sales services. The company exports its products to approximately 20 countries. Tianjin MOTIMO Membrane Technology Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Tianjin, the People's Republic of China.

300368.SZ.summary: Hebei Huijin Electromechanical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, marketing, and service of banking and financial equipment in China and internationally. The company offers banknote processing systems, banding machines, banknote strapping machines, tube binding machines, cash transit boxes, banknote shrink and packing machines, automatic debit card issuing machines, automatic check machines, stamp management systems, banknote sorters and counters, office equipment, etc., as well as consumables, such as strapping belts, security seals, banding tapes, and binding tubes. Its products are used in banks, government departments, insurance companies, securities firms, organizations, communities, schools, enterprises, and institutions. The company is also involved in sheet-metal processing, banking business process outsourcing, software development, etc. Hebei Huijin Electromechanical Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Shijiazhuang, China.

300384.SZ.long_name: Beijing Sanlian Hope Shin-Gosen Technical Service Co., Ltd.
300384.SZ.summary: Beijing Sanlian Hope Shin-Gosen Technical Service Co., Ltd. provides technical and engineering contracting services in the polyamide industry in China. It offers EPC services of polyamide technologies, including polycondensation and filament crafts. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

300402.SZ.summary: Nanjing Baose Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and installation of special material pressure vessels and pipe fittings of titanium, zirconium, nickel, and stainless steel. Its principal products include refined terephthalic acid, methyl methacrylate, coal chemical, acetic acid, coal power, and other sets of equipment; and large hull parts, marine pressure vessels, deep submersibles, and attachment, as well as pipes and fittings for various special purposes. The company's products are used in petroleum, chemical, metallurgy, environmental protection, nuclear power, military industry, and marine engineering and other fields. It exports its products to the United States, Canada, Brazil, Germany, France, Britain, Egypt, South Africa, Singapore, Australia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Nanjing Baose Titanium Industry Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Nanjing, China.

300411.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Jindun Fans Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of ventilation system equipment in China. It offers reversible axial and jet, axial and jet, mixed flow, centrifugal, ventilating cube, roof, and marine or navy axial and centrifugal fans, as well as mufflers, and air valves and inlets for use in metros, tunnels, nuclear power plants, naval ships, industrial and civil ventilation systems, etc. The company is based in Shangyu, China.

300412.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Canaan Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and marketing of pharmaceutical equipment. It supplies solid preparation and solutions. The company offers granulating, OEB high containment, tablet press, blending, capsule filling, coating, washing, dispensing, packing, water, and charging series products, as well as pharma bins and parts. It primarily serves pharmaceutical industry. Zhejiang Canaan Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Wenzhou, China.

300415.SZ.summary: Guangdong Yizumi Precision Machinery Co.,Ltd. designs, researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and services various molding machines in China and internationally. It offers injection molding machines, die-casting machines, rubber injection molding machines, and robotic automation systems, as well as high-speed packaging machines for use in various industries, including food packaging, beverage packaging, medical and healthcare, etc. Guangdong Yizumi Precision Machinery Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.

300420.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Wuyang Parking Industry Group Co.,Ltd.
300420.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Wuyang Parking Industry Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, production, and sale of automation equipment in China and internationally. It offers intelligent parking investment, construction, operation, and integration services. The company provides intelligent parking solutions for government organizations, hospitals, schools, etc. It also offers automated production lines, logistics and intelligent warehousing systems, belt conveyor core devices, dry mortar mixing stations, concrete mixing plants, tubular busbars, mine safety equipment, solid state electronic hard disk products, and unmanned boats, as well as financial services. The company was formerly known as Xuzhou Wuyang Technology Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Wuyang Parking Industry Group Co., Ltd. in January 2018. Jiangsu Wuyang Parking Industry Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Xuzhou, China.

300430.SZ.long_name: Beijing Chieftain Control Engineering Technology Co., Ltd.
300430.SZ.summary: Beijing Chieftain Control Engineering Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells production process automation systems for the biological and pharmaceutical industries in China. The company offers CTN production process control systems; fermentation production process control systems; and continuous offline automatic control systems. It also provides automatic control systems for starch production, starch sugar production, and fructose production, as well as solutions for the pulverization, mixing, and dispensing of sterile APIs. The company's products are used in the pharmaceutical, chemical, food, additive, power, and other fields. Beijing Chieftain Control Engineering Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Beijing, China.

300435.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Zhongtai Cryogenic Technology Corporation develops, designs, manufactures, and sells cryogenic equipment in China. The company offers packaged units, such as cryogenic liquefaction plants for liquefied natural gas; cryogenic purification plants for liquid nitrogen washing devices; and cryogenic separation plants for H2-CO separation units. It also provides cold box products that include liquefied natural gas, liquid nitrogen washing, ethylene, air separation unit, propane dehydration propylene, methanol to olefins/methanol to propylene, and carbon monoxide cold boxes. In addition, the company offers plate-fin heat exchangers, such as aluminum plate-fin heat exchangers and ethylene column overhead condensers/plate-fin vessels. It serves customers in the energy, chemical, metallurgy, electric power, liquefied natural gas, and modern coal chemical industries. Hangzhou Zhongtai Cryogenic Technology Corporation also exports its products to the United State, Europe, India, etc. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300441.SZ.long_name: Ningbo BaoSi Energy Equipment Co., Ltd.
300441.SZ.summary: Ningbo BaoSi Energy Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of screw compressors and machine components in China and internationally. The company's products include screw compressor host machines; screw machines for coal bed methane, natural gas, oil and associated gas; whole machines; compressor accessories; and vacuum pumps, as well as other products. Its products are used in various fields of petrochemical, mining and metallurgy, and electricity. The company is based in Fenghua, China. Ningbo BaoSi Energy Equipment Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Yinuo Baosi Group Ltd.

300442.SZ.summary: Shanghai Precise Packaging Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells packaging machinery, integrated machinery, and three ring products in China. It offers in-line cup, full-automatic flexible packaging, full-automatic sterile flexible packaging, full-automatic sterile brick-type packaging, full-automatic UHT ultra-high-temperature tubular sterilization, sub-high-temperature sterilization, box filling, pipe sticking, hydraulic paper pushing/sterilize brick, and hydraulic paper embracing machines, as well as packaging materials. The company also provides integrated machineries, including high pressure homogenizers, spray pumps, and dispersion emulsifying machines; colloid mills and rotor pumps; plunger seal rings; homogenizing valves that are made of special ultra-hard materials; special and wear-resisting plungers; and hydraulic pressure regulating components, as well as single, double, and three-leaf pumps. In addition, it offers single-layer paddle-type stirring storage tanks, double-layer storage tanks, three-layer cold and hot tank series, SZ flash evaporation units, single-effect falling film evaporators, double-effect and multi-effect falling film evaporators, gyp drying machines, vibrated fluidized beds, power towers, cheese grooves, cheese production equipment, plate-type heat-exchange equipment, sheet bar and rubber blankets, and pasteurization machines. Shanghai Precise Packaging Co., Ltd. is based in Shanghai, China.

300443.SZ.summary: Jinlei Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the forging, heat treatment, machining, coating, and quality assurance activities. The company was formerly known as Shandong Laiwu Jinlei Wind Power Technology Co., Ltd. Jinlei Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Jinan, China.

300444.SZ.summary: Beijing SOJO Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the research, production, sale, and export of power distribution equipment and automation equipment in the field of power transmission and distribution networks. It offers medium voltage switchgears, including solid insulated switchgears/RMU, SF6 insulated switchgears, air insulated switchgears, and air insulated compact switchgears; outdoor switch/reclosers, such as medium voltage outdoor vacuum reclosers, medium voltage outdoor circuit breakers, and outdoor load break switches; and switchgear components and cable accessories. The company also offers dry type, oil immersed, power, and special transformers; compact pre-fabricated substations; low voltage products and systems, including fixed-type low voltage switchgears, withdrawable low voltage switchgears, and low voltage multifunctional switchboards; and relay protection and automation equipment comprising feeder terminal units, data transfer units, protection control equipment, communication controllers, and fault indicator equipment. In addition, it provides power quality mitigation devices, such as active power filters, static VAR generators, and smart three-phase unbalance regulators; and cable sectionalizing cabinets, including medium and low voltage cable sectionalizing cabinets. The company's products are used in electrical, railway, oil, underground, military, steel, coal and electrical vehicles industry, etc. It also offers energy solutions, such as EV chargers, distributed photovoltaic grid systems, and Li-ion battery separators. Beijing SOJO Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300450.SZ.summary: Wuxi Lead Intelligent Equipment CO.,LTD. develops, manufactures, and sells intelligent equipment in China. It offers products, such as Li-ion battery equipment, Photovoltaic equipment, 3C intelligent equipment, capacitor equipment, LEAD MES, intelligent logistics, and vehicle production line. The company was formerly known as Wuxi Lead Auto Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wuxi Lead Intelligent Equipment Co.,Ltd. in December 2015. Wuxi Lead Intelligent Equipment Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Wuxi, China.

300457.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Yinghe Technology Co., Ltd provides lithium battery production line solutions in China. It offers include automatic pulping machines, coating machines, roll press machines, cutting machines, pelleters, winding machines, die-cutting machines, laminating machines, assembly automatic lines, liquid filling machines, pre-charge machine, PACK automatic lines, etc. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300461.SZ.summary: Tanac Automation Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and marketing of integrated automation systems and solutions worldwide. The company primary products include winding automation equipment, non-standard automation equipment, assembly automation equipment, test automation equipment, automation equipment, industrial robot application, intelligent factory, and others under the TANAC brand. It also provides after sale services. The company provides customized solutions for transformer inductance, machine manufacturing, consumer electronics manufacturing, automobile, household appliance, medical, and logistics industries. Tanac Automation Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Jiashan, China.

300462.SZ.long_name: Shanghai Huaming Intelligent Terminal Equipment Co., Ltd.
300462.SZ.summary: Shanghai Huaming Intelligent Terminal Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of automatic fare collection (AFC) equipment of metro rail transit, bus rapid transit, bus station, and related fields in China. It provides various series of products, including ticket vending machines, automatic gate machines, ticket checking machines, add value machines, booking office machines, encoders/sorters, etc. The company's equipment is also applied in pavilions, scenic spots, and entry guard systems. It offers modules of AFC for various systems, including barrier modules, thin ticket issuing and recycle modules, token ticket issuing and recycle modules, coin processing and dispensing modules, etc. Shanghai Huaming Intelligent Terminal Equipment Co., Ltd. is based in Shanghai, China.

300470.SZ.summary: Sinoseal Holding Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells fluid sealing products in China. The company offers mechanical seals for pumps, including contact and non-contact, spring mechanical/metal bellows, single, non-pressurized dual and pressurized dual, and general type and high performance seals. It also provides seals for agitators, such as seals for high/medium/low pressure agitators, sing/double/multiple seals, contact and non-contact seals, and wet and dry seals; and DGS seals for compressors and carbon ring seals, as well as other seals. In addition, the company offers seal support systems comprising wet and gas seal systems; seals for nuclear power; and rotary jet pumps, as well as UTEC products. Its products are used in the petrochemical, coal chemical, oil and gas transport, nuclear power, electricity, hydropower, pharmaceutical, metallurgy, food, shipping, aerospace, military, and other industries. The company also exports its products to Southeast Asia, Central Asia, the Middle East, and other regions. Sinoseal Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1978 and is based in Chengdu, China.

300486.SZ.summary: OMH Science Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells logistics convey systems, logistics storage systems, three-dimensional parking systems, and AGV industrial robots. The company's logistic convey products consist of friction conveyor systems, skid conveyor systems, and chain conveyor systems primarily used in automobile, medicine, electronic commerce, household appliance, mechanical, and other industries. It also offers ASRS, stereo garage, sorting and distributing, automated conveyors, and AGV products, as well as supply chain software. The company was formerly known as Shanxi Oriental Material Handling Co., Ltd. and changed its name to OMH Science Group Co., Ltd. in June 2020. OMH Science Group Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Taiyuan, China.

300499.SZ.long_name: Guangzhou Goaland Energy Conservation Tech. Co., Ltd.
300499.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Goaland Energy Conservation Tech. Co., Ltd. develops and supplies pure water cooling equipment for power electronic devices in China and internationally. It offers water cooling equipment for HVDC converters; flexible AC transmission and distribution thyristor valves; renewable energy converters; and high power electrical drive converters, as well as accessory water distributing pipes. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

300503.SZ.summary: Guangzhou Haozhi Industrial Co.,Ltd. designs, manufactures, sells, and repairs precision electro-spindles and related spare parts in China. It offers PCB, glass grinding, lathe, engraving, machining, grinding, woodworking, ultrasonic, engraving and milling motorized, hydraulic static, and straight and belt-type mechanical spindles; drilling centers; and reducer, turntable and pendulum, tool holder, linear motor, and chuck series products. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

300508.SZ.long_name: Shanghai Weihong Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.
300508.SZ.summary: Shanghai Weihong Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. provides motion control system solutions in China and internationally. It offers control cards; integrated and handheld CNC systems; servo drivers; and CNC accessories, including manual pulse generators and tool sensors. The company sells its CNC controllers for machine tool manufacturers. Its products are used in various industries, such as machining centers, laser and waterjet cutting, engraving and milling, mold making, advertising, glass and stone machining, etc. Shanghai Weihong Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300509.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Newamstar Packaging Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of beverage packaging machinery in China and internationally. The company offers pretreatment systems, including water treatment, processing, UHT, CIP, COP/SOP, and disinfectant blending systems, as well as carbon mixers; Starbloc, bottled water, container, aseptic, ultra-clean, CSD, hot-fill, and non-beverage combiblocks; blowing systems, such as bottle, container, and gallon blowers; and aseptic, ultra-clean, hot, water, gallon-water, CSD, liquor, condiment, edible oil, and daily chemical product filling systems. It also provides secondary packaging systems comprising conveyor systems, bottle warmers, bottle tilting systems, shower cooling tunnels, film and carton wrappers, sorting robots, robot encasers and palletizers, and mechanical palletizers; and automated warehouse systems, rail guided vehicles, automated guided vehicles, and warehouse management systems. The company is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

300510.SZ.summary: Jilin Jinguan Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design engineering, manufacture, construction, operation, and maintenance of power supply solutions for cities and communities in China. The company offers full gas insulated intelligent, semi gas insulated, and solid insulated ring main units, as well as outdoor ring main unit switching stations; fixed and movable high-voltage switchgears; vacuum circuit breaker and column switch series medium-voltage switchgears; box-type substations; and fixed, drawer, and fix partitioned low voltage switchgears. It also provides power cables and accessories, such as cold shrinkable cross-linked cable accessories, cross-linked cable silicone rubber GIS terminals, full cold shrinkable cross-linked cable silicone insulated joints and straight joints, and pull-type cable plug terminals. In addition, the company offers smart grid system, municipal engineering system, energy and chemical system, rail transit system, and international cooperation solutions. Jilin Jinguan Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Changchun, China.

300512.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Zhongya Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of packaging equipment for liquid products in China and internationally. Its products include filling sealing equipment comprising pouch filling equipment, such as aseptic soft-packaging forming filling sealing equipment; cup filling equipment, which include plastic cup forming, linear preformed cup, and rotary preformed cup filling sealing equipment, as well as PET cup forming filling sealing machines; and bottle filling equipment consisting of linear clean type and ultra clean type plastic bottle filling capping, linear aseptic plastic bottle filling capping, rotary plastic bottle weighing filling capping, and rotary plastic bottle filling sealing equipment, as well as blowing filling capping integrated machines. The company also provides bottle blow equipment, including full automatic and electric extrusion blow molding machines, full automatic injection blow and stretch blow molding machines, full electric injection stretch blow molding machines, and full automatic high speed rotary stretch blow molding machines. In addition, it offers downstream packaging equipment, such as sleeve wrapping, case packing and box packing, and stick product case packing equipment, as well as case packing machines; and integrated lines solutions comprising aseptic soft pouch product packaging, multi-pack product packaging, preformed cup product packaging, liquid ultra clean bottle beverage product, high volume bottle product packaging, pouch product downstream case packing, daily chemicals bottle product packaging, bottle carbonated beverage ultra clean, and preformed can product ultra clean production lines. The company's products are used in dairy, beverage, edible oil and grease, seasoning, household, and other industries. Hangzhou Zhongya Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300521.SZ.summary: AMSKY Technology Co., Ltd researches, develops, manufactures, and sells industrial printing technology in China and internationally. The company provides 3D printing series and CTP series printers. Its products are applied in 3D printing, digital garment printing, electronic printing, inkjet ceramics, outdoor inkjet, and label printing. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou Amsky Technology Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to AMSKY Technology Co., Ltd in May 2018. AMSKY Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

300527.SZ.summary: China Harzone Industry Corp., Ltd researches, manufactures, and sells emergency traffic engineering equipment in China. The company offers emergency hard mobile and soft mobile pavement equipment, plate beam bridges; modular engineering ships, steam cushion carriers, and water platforms; emergency repair of steel beams; and emergency assembling hangars and emergency aprons. It also provides emergency rescue disposal equipment, such as medical vehicles, high-power long-distance water supply and drainage special vehicles, and command vehicles; fire rescue equipment; and public emergency equipment, including emergency lighting products, non-woven masks, first-aid kits, gas masks, on-board emergency kits, emergency data lines, multi-purpose vehicle window breakers, and portable fire extinguishers. It offers its products for use in military and civil projects. The company also exports its products to approximately 40 countries. China Harzone Industry Corp., Ltd was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Wuhan, China.

300540.SZ.long_name: Chengdu Shenleng Liquefaction Plant Co., Ltd.
300540.SZ.summary: Chengdu Shenleng Liquefaction Plant Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of cryogenic technology for liquefaction of varied gases in China. The company provides products, such as natural gas liquefaction plants, coke-oven gas liquefaction plants, coal-bed methane liquefaction plants, air separation units, tail gas from chemical plants and LPG/NGL recovery facilities, N2 and O2 liquefiers, energy storage facilities, LNG/LCNG refueling stations, large-scale cryogenic storage tanks, and booster turbo-expander units. It also offers process package design, equipment manufacturing, project management, project safety control, technical training, and after sales services. The company exports its products to the United States, the United Kingdom, Egypt, India, Indonesia, and others. Chengdu Shenleng Liquefaction Plant Co., Ltd. is based in Chengdu, China.

300553.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Jizhi Mechatronic Co., Ltd. engages in the production and development of balance machine equipment in China. The company's products include electromechanical industry, auto parts, vertical, pump, and turbine balancing machines. Its products are used in automotive motors, household appliances, power tools, turbochargers, tire hubs, crankshafts, brake discs, clutches, flywheels, wind turbines, general motors, various types of fans, water pumps, impellers, blowers, petrochemicals, and turbo compressors. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300569.SZ.summary: Qingdao Tianneng Heavy Industries Co.,Ltd manufactures and supplies wind turbine towers and related equipment. The company offers onshore wind turbines, and offshore wind power towers, as well as photovoltaic power plants. Qingdao Tianneng Heavy Industries Co.,Ltd was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Jiaozhou, China.

300607.SZ.summary: Guangdong Topstar Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of industrial robots in China. It provides standard linear robots, abnormal equipment, solution systems, automation solutions, energy saving and information planning products, and Huiqi robots. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Dongguan, the People's Republic of China.

300619.SZ.long_name: Foshan Golden Milky Way Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd.
300619.SZ.summary: Foshan Golden Milky Way Intelligent Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, production, and sale of conveying, metering, mixing, dispersing, reaction, filling, packaging, online testing, central control, and other intelligent systems in China. Its products are applied in the fields of organic silicon, polymer compounds, lithium battery slurry, and biochemistry. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Foshan, China.

300669.SZ.long_name: Hangzhou Huning Elevator Parts Co., Ltd.
300669.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Huning Elevator Parts Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells elevator parts in China and internationally. It offers roller guide shoes, hydraulic buffer products, safety gear, rope brakes, UCMP products, electromagnetic rail clamp devices, and pulling devices. The company is based in Hangzhou, China.

300694.SZ.summary: Wuxi Lihu Corporation Limited. manufactures and sells turbo-charger components. The company develops, produces, and sells compressor and turbine casings. It offers shell and volute products. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Wuxi, China.

300718.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Changsheng Sliding Bearings Co., Ltd.
300718.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Changsheng Sliding Bearings Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells bearings in China and internationally. It offers metal-polymer composite, bi-metallic composite, bronze wrapped, metallic self-lubricating, and non-metallic self-lubricating bearings, as well as other bearings, such as air compressor swash plates, sintered bearings, steel sleeves, spherical bearings, and solid bronze alloy bearings. Its products are used in engineering machinery, fitness equipment, auto, logistics, mechanical, energy, industry, municipal, and household applications. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Jiashan, China.

300720.SZ.long_name: Guangdong High Dream Intellectualized Machinery Co., Ltd.
300720.SZ.summary: Guangdong High Dream Intellectualized Machinery Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells weighing machineries in China in China and internationally. It provides multihead weighers, loss-in weight feeders, metal detectors, and check weighers. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Foshan, China.

300757.SZ.summary: RoboTechnik Intelligent Technology Co., LTD engages in designing, developing, manufacturing, and selling smart manufactory automated solutions in China. The company offers manufacturing execution systems; clean energy systems, such as diffusion processing automation systems, PECVD processing automation systems, PERC processing automation systems, tesing and sorting, and wet processing automation systems; and assembly and test lines for motor brushes, transformer coils, oil and water pumps, oil control valves, solenoids, VVT intake and exhaust systems, and central valves, as well as assembly lines for valve bodies. It also provides smart rack and storage, FPC layup, laser cutting, FPC sorting, FPC PSA, FPC multi-function testing and sorting, and product unloading machines, as well as bagged milk packaging automation systems. The company offers its solutions for clean energy, electronic and semi-conductor, and automotive, as well as food and pharmaceutical industry segments. RoboTechnik Intelligent Technology Co., LTD is based in Suzhou, China.

300772.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Windey Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells wind turbines and wind farm O&M products. It also provides wind farm planning, technical consulting, and construction services, as well as supplies spare parts. Zhejiang Windey Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300780.SZ.summary: Sichuan Dawn Precision Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pulley, bushing, and other mechanical transmission parts in China. It provides pulleys, gears, sprockets, timing pulleys, couplings, locking assemblies, bushes, gear motors, machine tool accessories, industrial belts, and other machinery spare parts. The company also offers its products through online. Sichuan Dawn Precision Technology Co., Ltd. also exports its products to the regions of Europe, North America, Asia and Africa. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Dwan Drive Machinery Limited Liability Company and changed its name to Sichuan Dawn Precision Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2015. Sichuan Dawn Precision Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Meishan, China.

300786.SZ.long_name: Qingdao Guolin Environmental Technology Co., Ltd.
300786.SZ.summary: Qingdao Guolin Environmental Technology Co., Ltd., along with its subsidiary, engages in the design and manufacture, installation, debugging, and maintenance of ozone equipment. The company offers large ozone generators, middle ozone generators, small ozone generators, ozone generators for swimming pools, ozone generators for space, high-concentration ozone dissolved water machines, ozone disinfector, porous diffusers, oxygen generators, titanium diffusion sticks, and injectors. It also provides pressure vessels, such as adsorption air dryers, ozone mixing oxidation towers, PSA oxygen generators, ozone generation tanks, and pressure gas storage tanks; transformers, including dry type air core reactors, flat wave reactors, line reactors, control transformers, and dry type transformers; piezoelectric ceramics comprising needle selection ceramic plates, atomization ceramic plates, piezoelectric vibrating plates, tire balancing machine sensors, piezoelectric power generation ceramic pieces, ultrasonic cleaning oscillators, and ultrasonic cleaning ceramic plates; and glyoxalic acid crystals. Qingdao Guolin Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Qingdao, China.

300797.SZ.summary: NCS Testing Technology Co., Ltd. provides third-party testing services in China. The company offers testing services, including chemical composition testing, mechanical property testing, material failure analysis, nondestructive testing, and measurement calibration services, as well as proficiency testing services. It also develops and sells analysis and testing instruments, NDT equipment, certified reference materials, and other products; and provides anti-corrosion products, as well as related engineering services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. NCS Testing Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Iron & Steel Research Institute Group Co., Ltd.

300809.SZ.summary: Hiecise Precision Equipment Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacturing, delivery, installation, and maintenance of fully automatic CNC roll grinders. Its products are used in hot-rolled steel sheet, medium-thick steel strip, headless strip, home appliance board, tinplate and auto sheet cold rolling line, aluminum foil and mirror aluminum wire, copper plate strip, non-woven fabric production line, paper production line, machinery manufacturing and other fields. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Kunshan, China.

300812.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Etmade Automatic Equipment Co., Ltd.
300812.SZ.summary: Shenzhen ETmade Automatic Equipment Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells equipment for the flat panel display industry in China. The company offers liquid crystal display module, liquid crystal glass manufacturing, touch screen, and OLED display equipment. Its products include fully automatic medium and small size polarizing attachment equipment; full fitting equipment; backlight assembly equipment; and semi-automatic film attachment equipment. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300823.SZ.summary: Tjk Machinery (Tianjin) Co., Ltd. manufactures reinforcement steel processing machines in China and internationally. The company provides coil and bar stirrup benders; cutters, benders, shear lines, and bending and shaping centers; rotor and roller type wire straightening machines; cage making machines; cold rolling and drawing machines; lattice girders; and reinforcement, fine and livestock, and mesh cutter and bender wire meshes. It also offers accessory devices, including payoffs and lifting devices. Tjk Machinery (Tianjin) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Tianjin, China.

300836.SZ.summary: Kunshan TopA Intelligent Equipment Co.,Ltd offers intelligent manufacturing equipment and components, and related technical services primarily for vehicle and consumer electronics markets in China and internationally. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Kunshan, China.

300838.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Linuo Flow Control Technology Co.,Ltd
300838.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Linuo Flow Control Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, design, production, and sale of fluid control equipment in China and internationally. The company offers segment ball, knife gate, ball, globe control, and butterfly valves; and actuators. It serves energy, petrochemical, metallurgy, chemical, paper, environmental protection, pharmaceutical, and mining industries. Zhejiang Linuo Flow Control Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2003 and is based in Ruian, China.

300853.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Shenhao Technology Co.,LTD. engages in research and development of artificial intelligence, data monitoring, smart grid, and other industrial health-related technology products. The company offers wheeled intelligent inspection robots, health guardian robots, disinfection robots, and smart helmet systems. Its products are used for patrol inspection and online monitoring of industrial equipment. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300861.SZ.summary: Yangling Metron New Material Inc. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells electroplated diamond wires and tools. The company's diamond wires are used in various applications, including silicon slicing, crystal and magnetic material cutting, and sapphire cutting and squaring. It has strategic partnership agreements with GCL-Poly, JinkoSolar, Longi, etc. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Yangling, China.

300875.SZ.summary: Tianjin Jieqiang Power Equipment Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells nuclear, chemical, and biological defense equipment for the military industry. Its products include hydraulic and electric drive systems, hydraulic self-generators and air compressors, and decontamination devices. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Tianjin, China.

300912.SZ.summary: Kailong High Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and after-sales service of SCR exhaust after-treatment products. It offers light and heavy duty diesel, marine/stationary engine, gasoline engine, and CNG engine after treatment systems, as well as diesel particulate filters, exhaust treatment devices for tunnel/industrial stoves, vehicle exhaust heating systems, auto temperature-control cooling systems of engine, centralized lubrication systems of passenger-carrying chassis, eddy current retarders, carriers and catalytic products, components and parts of bus, etc. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Wuxi, China.

300931.SZ.summary: GENERAL Elevator Co., Ltd. manufactures and services green elevators worldwide. The company manufactures passenger, panoramic, high-speed, stretcher, and sickbed elevators; freight, car, and dumbwaiter elevators; and commercial escalators, heavy-duty public escalators, and moving walks. It also provides elevator installation and modernization; escalator and autowalk modernization; and intelligent building upgrade solutions. GENERAL Elevator Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Suzhou City, China.

300943.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co., Ltd.
300943.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells flow control valve and control systems. The company offers 4-Way reversing valves, expansion valves for car air conditioner, electronic expansion valves, solenoid valves, proportional valves for oil machine, hydraulic valve assemblies for boilers, ABS hydraulic regulators, and gas regulation systems. It also offers other equipment and components, analysis instrument, leisure and comfort shoes, power transmission and transformer, boiler and furnace, power transmission and transformer, solenoid valve, gate valve, meter for liquid and gas, elevator, brake, solenoid valve, generator parts and accessories, physical measuring meter, heater and heat exchange, gasoline and gas pump, pipe and tube, other auto parts, other valves, meter for liquid and gas, and other valves. Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Shaoxing Chunhui Refrigeration Equipment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. in November 2001. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shangyu, China. Zhejiang Chunhui Intelligent Control Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Zhejiang Chunhui Group Co.,Ltd.

300950.SZ.summary:
Doright Co.,Ltd. engages in the design, research and development, manufacture, inspection, sale, and servicing of energy-saving environmental protection equipment in China. Its products include energy-saving heat exchange equipment, including heat exchangers, high-temperature air preheater, waste heat boiler, rotary dryer, new energy saving type ceramic fiber fire box, and quench boiler; cryogenic heat exchanger with pin-tube type, reactors, atmospheric pressure vessels and tanks, and tower piece; and powder and exhaust environmental protection equipment, including harrow dryer, carbon black feeder, pin tube heat exchanger, installation and maintenance of pressure pipelines, wet pelletizer, dry pelletizer, pigment pelletizer, rotary dryer, waste heat boiler, quench boiler, and carbon black feeding pump
 The company provides clean combustion and energy-saving heat transfer solutions for customers in the fields of chemical, energy, metallurgy, and sludge and waste incineration industries. It also operates in Europe, North America, South America, Oceania, Africa, and the rest of Asia. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Qingdao, China.

3348.HK.summary: China PengFei Group Limited manufactures and installs rotary kilns and grinding equipment, and its related equipment in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers rotary kilns, preheaters, dryers, coolers, control systems, and related parts and components; tube and vertical mills, roller presses, powder sorters, crushers, and dust collectors; and spare parts for ball and vertical mills, and rotary kilns. The company also provides production line construction services comprising design, procurement, construction, and/or trial operations of production lines; manufactures building materials; and leases property and equipment. It serves customers in building materials production, metallurgy, chemical, and environmental protection industries. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Hai'an, the People's Republic of China.

600243.SS.summary: QingHaiHuaDing Industrial CO.,LTD. manufactures and sells machinery. The company offers CNC heavy-duty horizontal lathe, roll lathe, railway special lathe, vertical horizontal machining center, and CNC milling products, as well as precision elevator parts, and food machinery and other products. It also provides gantry machining center, boring and milling center, inorganic glass magnesium composite air duct, color plate phenolic composite duct, and floor boring and milling center products. The company is based in Xining, China.

600302.SS.summary: Xi'an Typical Industries Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of industrial sewing machines in China. The company offers single-needle and double-needle high-speed lockstitch sewing machines; flat-lock high-speed sewing machines; high-speed overstitching machines; special sewing machines; automatic sewing units; high-speed chain stitch interlock sewing machines; high speed overlock sewing machines; and heavy-duty sewing machines under the Typical brand. Its products are used in manufacturing knitting, clothing, suitcases, and boxes. The company also exports its products to the Asia-Pacific, Europe-Africa, American, and the Middle-East continents. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Xi'an, China.

600320.SS.long_name: Shanghai Zhenhua Heavy Industries Co., Ltd.
600320.SS.summary: Shanghai Zhenhua Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells heavy-duty equipment worldwide. The company offers various cranes; quayside container cranes, bulk cargo handling equipment such as ship loaders and ship unloaders; and stackers and reclaimers. It also provides various offshore products, such as floating cranes, pipelay vessels, and other engineering vessels; offshore platforms; DP systems and jacking systems; and goliath cranes. In addition, the company offers steel structures that comprise large and heavy scale steel structures, such as bridges, modules, and sea wind structures, as well as electrical products. Further, it engages in the marine transport and installation; and construction and installation of large-scale port equipment, engineering vessels, offshore heavy equipment, mechanical equipment, gear box for wind power generation equipment, largesized reverse branch, transmission mechanism, dynamic positioning, large-sized anchor windlass, offshore oil platform lifting device and components, and offshore wind turbine. In addition, the company is involved in the software development and integration; investment and financing business; leasing of cranes and engineering vessels; real estate development; and design and manufacturing of accessories. Further, it provides maintenance, consulting, and technical services. It owns a fleet of more than 20 transportation vessels. The company is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

600406.SS.summary: NARI Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides power intelligence solutions in China and internationally. It offers smart substation automation, smart dispatching, smart distribution, and smart utilization solutions. The company also provides SCADA/EMS/WAMS, renewable energy and power electronics, and industrial process control equipment. NARI Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Nanjing, China.

600416.SS.summary: Xiangtan Electric Manufacturing Co. Ltd. manufactures and sells electrical products in China and internationally. The company offers AC and DC motors, urban rail transit equipment, industrial water pump, electric control equipment, electric vehicle drive system, and ship electric propulsion system, as well as wind turbine products. It serves defense, electric power, energy, mining, transportation, chemical, light, water conservancy, and other construction industries. Xiangtan Electric Manufacturing Co. Ltd. was founded in 1936 and is based in Xiangtan, China.

600475.SS.long_name: Wuxi Huaguang Environment & Energy Group Co., Ltd.
600475.SS.summary: Wuxi Huaguang Environment & Energy Group Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells equipment in the field of energy and environmental protection. The company provides power station, gas turbine waste heat, and biomass boilers; flue gas desulfurization, denitration, and purification equipment; and garbage incinerators. It also offers comprehensive engineering services, as well as engages in the investment operations. The company was formerly known as Wuxi Huaguang Boiler Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Wuxi Huaguang Environment & Energy Group Co., Ltd. in June 2020. Wuxi Huaguang Environment & Energy Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China.

600481.SS.summary: Shuangliang Eco-Energy Systems Co.,Ltd produces and sells refrigeration, heating, and power systems in China.
